GSP33nysu__1u:8: yena prādurabhāvi bhūmivalaye vyastāri gosantatiḥ prābodhi śrutipaṅkajaṃ karuṇayā prākāśi tattvaṃ param /
GSP33nysu__1u:9: dhvāntaṃ dhvaṃsamanāyi sādhunikaraścākāri sanmārgagastena vyāsadivākareṇa satataṃ mā tyāji me mānasam // 2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:11: vyāptiryasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sapakṣe sthitirvyāvṛttiśca vipakṣato 'tha viṣaye saktinar vai bādhite /
GSP33nysu__1u:12: naivāsti pratipakṣayuktiratulaṃ śuddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ sa me bhūyāttattvavinirṇayāya bhagavānānandatīrtho muniḥ // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:14: bhavati yadanubhavādeḍamūko 'pi vāgmī jaḍamatirapi janturjāyate prājñamauliḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:15: sakalavacanaceto devatā bhāratī sā mama vacasi nidhattāṃ sannidhiṃ mānase ca // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:25: na śabdābdhau gāḍhā naca nigamacarcāsu caturā naca nyāye prauḍhā naca viditavedyā api vayam /
GSP33nysu__1u:26: paraṃ śrīmatpūrṇapramatigurukāruṇyasaraṇiṃ prapannā mānyāḥ smaḥ kimapi ca vadanto 'pi mahatām // 8 //
GSP33nysu__1u:28_4: karaṇīyaṃ śiṣyān grāhayituṃ granthādau nibadhnāti- nārāyaṇamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:31: asyodbhavādidamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyaṃ sadā priyatamaṃ mama sannamāmi // MAnuv_1,1.1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:37: nikhiletyādīnāṃ tu pramāṇakarmaṇā nārāyaṇena viśeṣaṇatayā sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:44: tathātve 'pi kṛto 'nyāsu devatāsu satīṣu tasyaiva namanamityatroktamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:45: viśiṣṭate vastvebhiriti viśeṣā asādhāraṇadharmā aśeṣāśca te viśeṣāśca /
GSP33nysu__1u:47: yāvanto vandyatvanimittabhūtā dharmāḥ tebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'pi hetubhyo vandyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:60: nikhilā niḥśeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekamapyanavadhikā guṇā ānandādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:62: ta eva deho yasya na punaḥ prākṛtādiriti tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:64: asya pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhatayā buddhisannihitasya svavyatiriktaprapañcasyodbhava utpattirādirasyetyudbhavādi janmādyaṣṭakaṃ tadyathāsambhavaṃ dadātītyudbhavādidastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:71: apauruṣeyatvena tanmūlatvena vānāśaṅkitadoṣatvādinā śobhanāni vākyāni vedādīni brahmasūtrādīni ca suvākyāni tairakhilairāpyatamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:73: yadi vyācikhyāsitena brahmamīmāṃsāśāstreṇa tannirṇetavyārthena vedādinā ca pratipādya iti nārāyaṇo vandanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:74: hanta tarhi tata eva dharmādikaṃ prāṇādikaṃ vā vandanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:85: na cāntareṇa lakṣaṇaṃ vastunirdhāraṇamityato vibhavādanekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇānyanenocyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:86: tatra nikhiletyanena nikhilaguṇatvaṃ pūrṇaguṇatvaṃ svato guṇaikadehatvaṃ ceti vipakṣābhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇānyuditāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:96: nikhiletyādyuktalakṣaṇopapannatayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavya ityataḥ
GSP33nysu__1u:115: athavā nāyaṃ nārāyaṇaśabdo ḍitthādiśabda iva bhagavati sāṅgetiko ghaṭādiśabda iva vā rūḍhimātrapravṛttaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:127: tṛtīyasūtreṇa tatra śāstraṃ pramāṇamabhidhāya tasyādhyāyaśeṣeṇa tadviṣayatopapāditā /
GSP33nysu__1u:134: viśeṣato me paramākhyavidyāvyākhyāṃ karomyanvapi cāhameva // MAnuv_1,1.2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:138: anvapi punarapi praṇamya bhaktayādyupetatālakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvāhaṃ paramākhyavidyāyā brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrarūpāyā vyākhyāṃ karomīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:144: bhāve vā pūrvaśloka eva bahuśaḥ sannamāmīti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:151: yo hi yacchāstre pravartate tasya tatprabhāvo gururiti prasiddhameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:153: jagata etacchāstrapravaktṛṇāṃ brahmādīnāmañjasā mukhyatayā na tu vayo 'dhikatvādimātreṇa gurum /
GSP33nysu__1u:155: prakārāntareṇa gurutvaṃ nārāyaṇasya samarthayate- viśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:157: viśeṣata iti sākṣādupadeṣyṛtvena na tu jagata iva paramparayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:158: atra yadi śāstraprabhavamityādyevocyeta tadā pṛthakpraṇāmena devatāyā gurośca pārthakyaśaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:182: tadbhāve 'pi tathāvidhavākyāntaraparityāgenāsyaiva vyākhyāne kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkānirāsāya paramākhyavidyetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:185: asti tāvadasmingranthe“dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca';
GSP33nysu__1u:197: tathāpi svapraṇītabhāṣyeṇaiva kṛtavyutpādanamidaṃ śāstramiti kimanena vyutpādanenetyato 'nvapi cetyāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:208: yaduktaṃ nārāyaṇo 'sya śāstrasya prabhava iti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:214: paraśabdasyānekārthatvena vidyāśabdasya cārthavivakṣāvirahiṇyapi mantre prayogadarśanena paravidyākhyāyāḥ sarvottamaprāmāṇyāniścāyakatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:215: kiñceyaṃ paravidyākhyaitadviṣayetyatrāpi na niyāmakamastītyata āha- prādurbhūta iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:216_1: prādurbhūto na tu jāto granthamimaṃ cakra ityanena nārāyaṇasya śāstraprabhavatve
GSP33nysu__1u:217: dṛśyante hi kevalaṃ kṛpāpāravaśyena paropakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarāṃ tairarthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:218: ata eva paraprayojanamapyātmagāmīva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstrapraṇayanamiti jñāpayitumātmanepadaprayogaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:220: paravidyākhyayā asya sarvottamaprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ vyutpādayituṃ paravidyākhyamityanūdyānuttamaṃ śāstramiti vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__1u:226: iti vidyādvayamuddiśya tatrāparetyādinā sāṅgānvedānaparavidyātvenoktavā“atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate';
GSP33nysu__1u:234: tadyathā paramadhārmika ityabhihite paramatvaṃ dharmeṇeti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:250: tā eva paramā vidyā yadā viṣṇostu vācakāḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:252: brahmamīmāṃsāśāstravyutpāditanyāyānupakṛtā hi vedādayo viṣṇoravācakāstadukṛtāśca tasya vācakā bhavantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:253: tathāpi kevalasya na paravidyātvaṃ labhyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:261: evaṃ tāvadāgamenāsya śāstrasyānuttamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhyādhunānumānato 'pi tat siṣādhayiṣurādau tāvatprāmāṇyamātre anumānaṃ vaktumāha- gururiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:262: yato yatkāraṇaṃ bādarāyaṇo gurūṇāṃ jagatastattvopadeśakānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ gururupadeṣyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:263_0: yataśca śāstrāṇāṃ vedānāṃ bhāratādīnāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ prabhavo gurūṇāmaśeṣārthapratipādakānāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:263_1: savistarāṇāṃ vedādiśāstrāṇāṃ gururmukhyaprabhavo na tu sampradāyamātrapravartaka iti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:265: taduditaṃ tena bādarāyaṇenopadiṣyamidaṃ śāstramato mānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:268: atra gururgurūṇāmityādihetūnāṃ vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgānāmānukūlyānyeva sākṣātsādhyāni mānasīti tu paramasādhyanirdeśa iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:270: vivakṣitārthatattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ vivakṣā ceti trayaṃ vakturānukūlyaṃ nāma /
GSP33nysu__1u:273: tatra gurūṇāṃ gururiti vakturbādarāyaṇasya vivakṣitārthatattvajñānasādhane hetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:274: yo hi yasya tattvopadeṣyā sa tato 'dhikatattvajñānavānupalabdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:275: ayaṃ ca sarvajñakalpānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ tattvopadeṣyā brahmarudrādideveṣvityādyāgamādavagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:277: gurūṇāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ guruḥ prabhava ityanenāpi tattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ ca sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:278: yo hi yāvadatharpratipādakasyāgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantamarthaṃ tattvato jānannavagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:281: yaśca bahorāgamasya prabhavaḥ so 'sati nimittāntare paṭukaraṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:282: ayaṃ cāparasya vedādeḥ prabhavaḥ kathamapaṭukaraṇo bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:285: nahi svayaṃ tattvajñānāyogyaḥ pareṣāṃ tattvopadeṣyā dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:292: nanvatra gururgurūṇāmityādīnāṃ śāstraprāmāṇyena yathāśruta eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo vyākhyāyatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:298: yadyapi caite pratyekaṃ bauddhāgamādau mānatāṃ vyabhicaranti /
GSP33nysu__1u:304: teṣāmapraṇītatvādbādarāyaṇena brahmādīnprati tanmokṣārtamupadiṣṭatvamātraṃ hetuḥ syāditi cedbāḍham /
GSP33nysu__1u:306: tathā sati gururgurūṇāṃ prabhavaḥ śāstrāṇāmiti vyarthamāpadyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:327: naca pratyakṣādau satyapi prāmāṇye nāstyāptavākyatvamiti sādhyāvyāpakatvānnāyamupādhiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:331: saṃmatatve vā sādhanāvacchinne pauruṣeyavākyatvāvacchinne vā sādhye 'syopādhitvopapatteriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:336: api tarhyanukūlavaktrādimattvasyāptavākyatayā vyāptatvāttena tāṃ prasādhya tayā prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sādhyata ityāśayavānāha- vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:340: tena siddhayā'ptavākyatayā mānamidaṃ śāstramiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:352: pramāṇadṛṣṭeti viśeṣaṇe 'pi pramāṇadṛṣṭasya pramādādinānyathākathake api prasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:353: pramāṇena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ tathā vādīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:373: evaṃ sati yo yatraivambhūtaḥ sa tatrāpta ityuktaṃ syāditi cedastu ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:377: yo yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyaṃ dhanaṃ arhatītyādau sārvatrikavyavahārahetutopalambhāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:380: yathā cānanugatasyāpi nāvyāptiḥ sārvatrikavyavahārahetutā ca tathā sāmānyaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:383: etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vakteti lakṣaṇadvayamapi samāhitaṃ veditavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:386: vipralipsā ca śrotṛprasaṅgānukūlataikanibandhanā tadabhāve nivartata iti vaktrādyānukūlyavattāyā āptavākyatayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:388: nahi nāṭakādiprabandhaṃ viracayannapi kadāciduktalakṣaṇopapanno na bhavati bhavabhūtiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:401: anukūlavaktrādimattayā āptavākyatāsādhane vaktrānukūlyasyāptyekadeśatvena sādhyāviśiṣṭatā ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:402: vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti vākyaṃ tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhanavyāpakatāpradarśanārthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:406: nahi upādhiṃ dūṣayatā sādhanavyāpakatāṃ vyutpādya sādhanenopādheḥ pakṣe sādhanaṃ vidhāya tena sādhyaṃ sādhanīyamiti kuladharmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:408: upādheḥ sādhanābhedaṃ pradarśya tena sādhyaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:416: anyathā yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo 'pi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:419: yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vaktā āpta ityāśritaṃ tadā sādhyaviśiṣṭatāyāḥ śaṅkaiva nāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:424: anyathāstu vaktrādyānukūlyaṃ vakturvipralipsāmūlatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ ca bhavatvityāśaṅkāyāḥ ko nivārayitā /
GSP33nysu__1u:425: yadyapi prāmāṇyaṃ svata eveti bādarāyaṇīyaṃ matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:431: evaṃ vijātīyasaṃvādenāsya śāstrasya prāmāṇyamupapādya tadanuttamatāsiddhaye sajātīyadvayasaṃvādamapyāha- śrutīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:434: yathā āptavākyatayā tathā śrutimūlatayāpītyupamārtho vā tathāśabdaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:436: tathāpyatra sāmānārthatāsāmyena gaupyā vṛttyā śrutiyuktisaṃvāditārthau vyākhyeyau /
GSP33nysu__1u:464: brahma vedastadarthaḥ parabrahma vā tasya sūtrāṇi brahmasūtrāṇi /
GSP33nysu__1u:465: sakalavedārthabhūtasya parabrahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ svarūpanirṇayārthāni sūtrāṇīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:467: etenaitacchāstravācinaḥ śārīrakaśabdasya śarīrameva śarīrakaṃ tatra bhavaḥ śārīrako jīvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:468: tamadhikṛtya kṛto 'yaṃ granthaḥ śārīraka iti vyākhyānaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:470: tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyabrahmarūpatā mīmāṃseti vyākhyānādavirodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:482: yata evaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ trividhaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:485: āptavākyatrayādiliṅgatrayāvasitaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ anyatrāpi cetsyāttadā kathameṣāṃ tadanuttamamityato brahmasūtrāṇāmevetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:506: tacca yāvadyāvadadhikaṃ pramīyate tattadanusāriṇīmaviśaṅkāṃ kṣiprapravṛttiṃ prasūta ityanubhavasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:512: svayaṃ kṛtāpi tadvayākhyā kriyate spaṣṭatārthataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.7 //
GSP33nysu__1u:514: tadevaṃ śrutyanumānābhyāmidameva śāstraṃ pramāṇatamaṃ nānyadetādṛśamastītyupasaṃharati- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:520: nanu cāsya śāstrasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ sūtrakāra eva prathamasūtre samarthayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:534: tathāpi nedaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ vyākhyātatvādityatrānvapi ceti yat prayojanāntaraṃ astīti sūcitaṃ tadvivaraṇārthamāha- svayamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:535: yadyapi teṣāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ vyākhyā svayaṃ mayaiva bhāṣye kṛtā tathāpi punaratra spaṣṭataivārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya spaṣṭatārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:547: yataḥ saṅkṣepavistarābhyāmuktaṃ śrotṛṇāṃ sugrahaṃ saprayojanaṃ ca bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:557: śāstraprabhavaṃ ityādibhirbahubhiḥ prakārairyadgurutvopapādanaṃ tena gurūṃśceti bahuvacanāntaṃ padaṃ vivṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:561: nirupapadasūtragrahaṇena yadbrahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaprāmāṇyaṃ sūcitaṃ tadupapādanaṃ paramākhyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:565: yasmādāptimūlatvādiyuktayāpi brahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayituṃ etaditi darśayati gururgurūṇāmityādineti /
GSP33nysu__1u:569: maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyaṃ parisamāpyante pracīyante ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:574: śrutiniścite tu sādhyasādhanabhāve tadabhāve 'pi bhāvo 'nekakāraṇakatvasya kalpako bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:577: nahi sāmagrīvaikalyena sādhyaṃ vyabhicaran heturahetuḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:579: nahi pratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ ajanayat kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:592: naca pratyakṣāderatrāvakāśa iti śrutireva śiṣyācāramūlaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:596: naca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnā eva na santīti tatparihārārthānanuṣṭhānaṃ na doṣāyeti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:598: yato maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavantyāyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:601: kiṃ nāma granthādau na niveśitamityapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:624: anyathādhikāriviṣayavaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīyatvaśaṅkā na nirākṛtā syādityanarthakaṃ sūtramāpadyetetyata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__1u:630: tatra prathamasūtre 'vayavatayā sarvaśāstrasya cāṅgatayā ceṣyate 'ṅgīkriyate sūtrakṛteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:635: yatparyāyāntaraṃ vihāyānayoreva kramāntaraṃ vihāyādāvevopādānaṃ tena jānīmo jñāpakatayā'disūtrasya kārakatayā samastaśāstrasya copayogitvenaitau sūtrakṛtā vivakṣitāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:642: atra yatpareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ“maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:645: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:646: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ lakṣyaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:648: naca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ'; /
GSP33nysu__1u:670: evaṃcāyamoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā maṅgalārthatayā sūtrādāvupanibaddha ityanupapannamityata āha- sarvatra iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:671: akhilaiḥ sūtrapāṭhakaiḥ yatpṛthagasaṃhitatayoṅkriyate tatsarvatra sūtreṣvanugatatvenābhilaṣitena nimittenopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:677: iti śrautārthavādasāmarthyātsarvāsvapi brahmavidyāsvādyantayoroṅkārasyohaḥ kartavya iti gamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:681: tasya saṃhitatayā nirdeśe prathamasūtrāvayava evāyaṃ vijñāyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:683: naca vyākhyānato 'pyadhikāro jñāyata iti vyarthaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:685: tadanenāsaṃhitatayā nirdeśe nimittāntaraṃ vadatā hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:687: nanu ca śrautārthavādabalenādyantayoroṅkārasyoho vā prāṅmukhatvādivadbahirbhūtasyaiva uccāraṇaṃ vā vidheyatvena kalpyamiti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:690: vakṣyamāṇanyāyenoṅkārārthasya prathamasūtravākyārthe samanvayena niścayopapattau bādhitaviṣayaṃ cānumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:693_1: labdhena sarvatrānugatatvena kāraṇenaivopapadyata ityanena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā /
GSP33nysu__1u:696_1: ca prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtterārambhaṇīyatāsiddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayituṃ prayojanādyabhisambandhaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:699: nanu brahmajñānasya mokṣahetutā yadi śāstrapravṛtteḥ prāgeva pramāṇāntarasiddhā vyarthaṃ tadā tadabhidhānaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__1u:701: athehaiva tanniścayastadā pravṛttau prayojanādiniścayo niścite ca prayojanādau pravṛttirityanyonyāśrayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:706: evameva tatra pravṛttāvuttaratrāpi tathātvaprasaṅgādanarthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:715: naca mumukṣuṇā anapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:716: puruṣātharsādhane tu icchālakṣaṇā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttistathā na svarasasiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:718: tasmādyo yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tatprayojanādikaṃ darśayitvaiva iti sārthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:721: uktaṃ ca prayojanādikaṃ śrotā kataṃ śraddadhītāśraddadhānaśca kathaṃ pravarteteti punaravaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:724: yadyapi āptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanādyanabhidhāne 'pi tatsāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanādimadidaṃ śāstraṃ āptoktatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:728: saca prayojanādiviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakaṃ tadabhidhānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:730: nanu sandehaḥ prayojanādyavacane 'pi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve sati sulabha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:734: yo hi yadvacanātpravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:736: nahi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ na veti yatra tatrocchṛṅkhalaḥ svayaṃ utprekṣya pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:750: yadi tāvadāptavākyatayā sūtramidaṃ prayojanāderniścāyakaṃ syāttadā'gamatayā nyāyasūtratvahāniḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:751: kiñcāptatvaṃ sūtrakṛto yena vedādinā pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ tenaiva prayojanādyabhisambandho 'pi śāstrasyāvagamyata iti vyarthaṃ tadabhidhānamāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:753: nahi kaścitprayojanādisandehe 'timahāyāsasādhye pravartate prāguktānarthaparamparāśca kathaṃ na śaṅketa /
GSP33nysu__1u:754: tasmānnedaṃ prayojanādyupadeśamātraṃ kintu śrautasya prayojanādeḥ nyeyenopapādanārthamityeva parihāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:755: āptatvaṃ tu nyāyasyopodbalakamātramiti bhāṣyakārīyaṃ tadvyutpādanamapi nānarthakam /
GSP33nysu__1u:776: yadīdaṃ śāstraṃ pareṇopalabhyeta tadoktasandehakāraṇopapattau prayojanārthitvena viśeṣasmṛtimataivaṃ sandihyeteti sūtrakṛta eva parakīyasambhāvitasaṃśayāharaṇopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:780: nahi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ taddvārabhūtanyāyanibandhanaṃ ca nārambhaṇīyamiti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:784: etacchāstravyutpādanīyanyāyakaraṇikāyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ ubhayavidhavyāpāradarśanādviśeṣādarśanācca saṃśayaḥ kiṃ kartavyā na veti /
GSP33nysu__1u:785: nanu ca tadvijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śrutivihitatvāt kathaṃ viśeṣādarśanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:792: kṛṣṭādikaṃ hi sati viṣayabhūte bhūmyādau prayojane ca sasyādhigamādāvadhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvalādau kartavyamupalabdham /
GSP33nysu__1u:793: sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamāneto vyāpyāmapi kartavyatāṃ vyāvartayatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:794: viṣayaśūnyatvāddhi samanaskendriyasannikṛṣṭasya sphītālokamadhyavartino ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:796: sambandhavaidhuryāddhi saprayojanaṃ saviṣayamapi śabdajñānamarthayamāno na vaidyake pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:816: evaṃ tarhi tata eva na jijñāsyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:817: ata evānāditastadīyatattvajñāne vidyamāne 'pi iṣyāniṣyaprāptiparihārayoradarśanānnāsau jijñāsitaḥ kasyacitprayojanasyeṣye /
GSP33nysu__1u:820: nanvayaṃ kartā bhoktā doṣasaṃsargī cāhaṃpratyaye prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:828: yatkvacicchāstre 'pi laukikapravedanīyārthavyutpādanamanuvādo 'sau na punaḥ sa eva pradhānavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:835: jīvasya cāhamiti svaprakāśatayā svaprakāśajñānāśrayatayā mānasapratyakṣavedyatayā vā siddhatvena na jijñāsāviṣayatvamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:857: svataḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre tu vedaviruddhānāmapi śākyādivacasāṃ tathātvāpātena punarvedāpramāṇyatādavasthyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:863: prayojanaṃ ceśvarajijñāsayā abhyudayo vā syāt mokṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:870: jijñāsā ca mokṣasādhanaṃ bhavantī kiṃ sākṣāduta jñānadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:884: atha parāmārtha evāyaṃ bandhastarhi na jñānena nivarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:890: śarīrādyabhāve ca tatsādhyasukhābhāvena kasyāpi tatrārthitānupapatteranadhikārikaṃ śāstramāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:891: ko hi svasthātmā sahasā sukhatatsādhane hātumutsahate /
GSP33nysu__1u:894: śāstraṃ cedamanārambhaṇīyamiti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavānācāryaḥ- oṃ athāto brahmajijñāseti //
GSP33nysu__1u:903: atra yaduktaṃ jīvavyatirikta īśvara eva nāstīti tatparihārāya sūtrakṛtoṅkārabrahmaśabdau prayuktau /
GSP33nysu__1u:911: nahi padaṃ cakṣurādivadapratīta evārthe pratītiṃ janayati yenāpūrvamarthaṃ padaprayogādeva pratīmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:913: kintu sannihitānekavākyārthasāmarthyāllabhyata ityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ- otatvavācīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:923_0: tathāca yadyasau karmāṇi tadā karturyadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇo 'pekṣāyāmupapadādyabhāve
GSP33nysu__1u:927: tathā ca pūrvavadyogyatayā “atha kasmāducyate brahmeti bṛhanto hyasmin guṇāḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:945: yatpunarakāravācyena tatpadārthenokāravācyasya tvaṃpadārthasyābhedo makāreṇocyate brahmaśabdena ca sakalastvātmakatvalakṣaṇapūrṇatābhidhīyata iti vyākhyānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:979: na cālaukikārthakalpane gauravaprasaṅgādvaraṃ kathañcideṣāṃ śabdānāṃ jīvādiviṣayāṅgīkaraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:986: tathāca śrautaṃ brahmādiśabdaṃ jīvādiviṣayamaṅgīkurvāṇenāpi niravagrahapūrṇatāyuktaṃ kiñcidabhidheyaṃ mukhyamaṅgīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:991: sa eva bhargaśabdārtho vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūmataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:992: bhāvanāccaiva sutvācca so 'yaṃ puruṣa ityapi // MAnuv_1,1.10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1001: vedasyeśvaraviṣayatā kuta ityato 'pyoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1007: ataḥ sa eva vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūrādīnāmartha iti gamyate“praṇavārthā vyāhṛtayaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1013: kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca sa evārtha ityata āha- bhūmata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1029: kimato na hi vyāhṛtaya eva veda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1032: nanu gāyatṛyāṃ yo bhargo no 'smākaṃ dhiyaḥ pracodayātprerayettasya saviturdevasya tadvareṇyaṃ rūpaṃ dhīmahi cintayāma iti bharganāmakaḥ savitā pratipādyo dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1033: tatkathaṃ bhagavatparatvamityata āha- sa eva bhargaśabdārtha iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1045: nanu puruṣasūkte puruṣasya paśorhiraṇyagarbhasya vā pratipādanātkathaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyata ityata āha- so 'yamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1048: “sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛpuriṣayo nainena kiñcanānāvṛtaṃ nainena kiñcanāsaṃvṛtam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1051: siddhe ca puruṣasūktārthatve viṣṇoḥ kiṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1054: sa eva sarvavedārtho jijñāsyo 'yaṃ vidhīyate // MAnuv_1,1.11ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:1061: ityādiśrutisiddhamapi bhagavataḥ sarvavedārthatvaṃ nyāyenopapādayitumayaṃ prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:1064: yo yadvayākhyeyārthaḥ sa tadartho yathā sampratipanna iti vā sarvo veda īśvaraparastatparoṅkāravyākhyānatvāditi vā sākṣādevānumānaṃ kiṃ na vyākhyāyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1065: “tadyathā sarvāṇi parṇāni śaṅkunā santṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇaiva sarvā vāk santṛṇṇā';
GSP33nysu__1u:1068: tathāpi vākyāntarabalena na sarvā vāgoṅkāravyākhyānaṃ sākṣātkiṃ nāmoktaprakāreṇa paramparayaiveti jñāpayitumitthaṃ vyākhyānamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1069: nanu ceśvare pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭavata oṃkārabrahmaśabdāveva kasmānnoktau kiṃ vedānumānena /
GSP33nysu__1u:1078: ayamiti uktavidhayā jīvajaḍātmakātprapañcādatyantaviviktatvena niścitatayā viṣayabhūtaḥ sarvavedārthatayā śakyapratipādanaścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1086: na hi bījasyāṅkuraṃ janayataḥ sahakāriṇo jalāderaṅkuro na kāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1094: tatra kartṛvyāpārasya karaṇavyāpāravyavadhānena vṛkṣakarmateva mīmāṃsāvyāpārasyāpi pramāṇādisambhāvanāddhāreṇeśvarāvabodha evoddeśya iti bhavati tatkarmatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1111: tathāpi pratibandhanivṛttau satyāmeva nirṇaya iti pratibandhakanirāsahetorapi vicārasyopacāreṇa nirṇayahetutvādupapannamīśvaraviṣayatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1113: īśvarasya vedapramāṇakatve tata eva niścitatvātkiṃ mīmāṃsayeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1117: apare tu tadaṅgīkṛtyāpi tadvācināṃ padānāṃ jīvādiviṣayatāṃ vyākurvantastadabhāvamasthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1118: anye tu punarastīśvaraḥ kintu paramārthato nirguṇa eveti saṅgirante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1119: eke tu saguṇo 'pi na jagataḥ kāraṇamapi tūdāsīna evetyātiṣṭhante /
GSP33nysu__1u:1123: kecidvigrahavantamityevamādyāsvanekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattvajñānakaraṇādapi vedāttadanutpattau tadapanodanadvāreṇa vedetikartavyatārūpā jijñāsā kartavyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1126: tatra tāvadbrahmaṇo jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso na punardharmāya jijñāsetivaccaturthīsamāsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1127: tādarthyasamāse prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti vārtikakṛtā prakṛtivikārabhāva eva caturthīsamāsasya niyamitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1136: jijñāsā khalu karmāpekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātuṃ śakyā na tu sambandhinaṃ vineti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāttadeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1139: evaṃ sati lakṣaṇādijijñāsāpi pratijñātā syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1147: iti karmāṇi ṣaṣṭhayāḥ samāsaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1152: athavā brahmaṇaḥ karmatvenāprādhānyaśaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ jijñāsya iti karmaprādhānyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1168: apare tu kāryaniṣṭha eva vedabhāgo vicāryatvena tatra prakrānto vicāritaśca na vastutattvaniṣṭha ityato vastutattvaniṣṭhaṃ vedabhāgaṃ vicārayitumidamārabhyata ityāhuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1171: dharmajijñāsāśāstraṃ tu vedaikadeśāmukhyārthadharmavicārāya pravṛttamityāśayena vā“sa eva bhargaśabdārthaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1173: tatra sarvavedārtha ityanena gatārthatāśaṅkānirāsaḥ sa eva na tu kāryaśeṣatayetyādyaṃ samādhānaṃ sarveti dvitīyaṃ ca nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1178: jñānī priyatamo 'to me taṃ vidvāneva cāmṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.11cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1179: vṛṇute yaṃ tena labhya ityādyuktibalena hi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1183: brahmajijñāsāyā niṣprayojanatvaṃ śaṅkitamapākartuṃ ataḥśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe- jñānīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1194: yasmāttasya brahmaṇo nārāyaṇasya prasādātparamānugrahādeva mucyate saṃsārāt na tu karmādineti“tamevam'“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute';
GSP33nysu__1u:1197: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti śrutibalena gamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1199: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti vākyānurodhena tatrāpyanusandheyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1205: na punaḥ karmādineti jñānī priyatamastamevaṃ vidvānityuktibalenāvagamyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1208: īśvarajñānaṃ ca tajjijñāsayaiva nānyeneti“ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:1209: iti paramātmadaśarnānuvādena tatsādhanatayā śrotavya ityādinā śravaṇādividhāyakoktibalena pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1214: yadyapi na jijñāsāyāḥ svargādirūpo 'bhyudayaḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1226: siddhaṃ ca sādhanaṃ bhagavāniti mumukṣuṇā savyāpārīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1238: prasādo nāmecchāviśeṣo guṇāntaraṃ vā na naḥ kacit kṣatiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1244: nacāvyaktasvabhāvo bhagavāṃsahasreṇāpi prayatnānāṃ śakyaḥ sākṣātkartuṃ vinā tadanugrahāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1247: naca nididhyāsanaṃ vākyārthagrahaṇalakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte 'pi vinā mananāparanāmnā vicāreṇopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1251: ye tu dhyānameva paramapāṭavāpannamaparokṣākāramiti manyante teṣāṃ darśanaśrutaya upacaritārthāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33nysu__1u:1266: evaṃca vicāro yato jñānasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ ca mokṣasādhanamato asau kartavya iti labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1269: īśvaraprasādasya tu jñāpakaṃ na kiñcidatra paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1274: ātmayāthātmyājñānādanātmani śarīrādāvātmatvārope sati hi tadanukūlapratikūlayo rāgadveṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1277: tasmācca duḥkhānubhava ityanādirayaṃ kāryakāraṇapravāhaḥ saṃsāra ityucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1283: tayorabhāve ca na pravṛtterutpattiḥ prāgupacitāyāścopabhogena prrakṣayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1286: janmābhāve ca na nirbījasya duḥkhasyotpāda ityevamātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttirmuktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1293: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:1294: yadanugrahataḥ santi na santi yadupekṣayā // MAnuv_1,1.13 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1295: narte tvat kriyate kiñcidityāderna hariṃ vinā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1296: jñānasvabhāvato 'pi syānmuktiḥ kasyāpi hi kvacit // MAnuv_1,1.14 //
GSP33nysu__1u:1322: upapādayiṣyate hi jñānānandādisvarūpo 'yaṃ jīva iti puṃstvādivadityādinā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1330: ataḥ kāmakarmādyatiriktaṃ māyāvidyā prakṛtirityādiśabdābhidheyamanādyeva kimapi dravyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1340: ataḥ parameśvara eva sattvādiguṇamayyā vidyāvirodhitvenāvidyayā svādhīnayā prakṛtyācintyādbhutayā svaśaktayā ca jīvasya svaprakāśamapi svarūpacaitanyamācchādayatīti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1343: prasanna evāsau svakīyāṃ māyāṃ vyāvartayatīti tatprasādārthaṃ sarvo 'pyayaṃ sādhanasandarbha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1344: tato yadyapi na sūtrākṣarebhyo bhagavatprasādo labhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1347: evamuktena nyāyena na jñānasyaivāyaṃ svabhāvo yatsākṣānmokṣasādhanatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1349: sakalakārakāṇāṃ tadadhīnasattāpravṛttitvena tadicchāṃ vinā kasyāpi kāryasyānudayāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1352: yena jñānasya mokṣahetutvamaṅgīkṛtaṃ na tenāpi īśvarecchāṃ tyaktuṃ śakyate /

GSP33nysu__1u:1434: ādye dhūmavānagnimāniti sāmānyavyāpteḥ parvato niragnika iti viśeṣavyāptirbalavatī prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1440: yadanādi tadajñānātiriktaṃ na nivartata iti saṅkocanīyam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1448: anāditvenājñānasyānivatyartve siddhe 'jñānatvasya tatraiva vyabhicāra iti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1459: kiñca tu śuktikājñānaṃ nāma kiṃ jñānābhāvo 'tha bhāvarūpamajñānam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1474: paramāṇuśyāmatāpratibandī tu tasyā api sopādānatvenaiva nirasteti /

GSP33nysu__1u:1490: nanvavayavatatsaṃyogavināśābhyāṃ dravyanāśo dṛṣṭastatkathamatra vināśa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1512: sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ sadyaḥ śarīrādipāte vātaputrīyāḥ pauruṣeyā brahmopadeśāḥ prasajyeranniti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1517: yena so 'pi kathaṃ teṣāṃ neti paryanuyujyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:1518: bhakteḥ parāvasthā hi taddheturuktā tatsampattiśca kāryagamyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1529: vastutastu bhagavāneva anāderapi bandhasya nivartaka iti sādhūktaṃ“jñānināṃ mokṣadaśca saḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1538: tato 'vidyāyāṃ nivṛttāyāmapi nāśeṣānandābhivyaktiryāvadīśvara eva svakīyāṃ bandhaśaktiṃ na tato vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1544: evaṃ tāvatsvamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya tatpariśuddhaye pareṣāṃ bhāṣyaṃ dūṣayati- bandhamithyātvamityādinā //
GSP33nysu__1u:1545: māyāvādinā hi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargakriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya bandhasyā'tmanyāropitatvena mithyātvaṃ svabhāṣyādau varṇitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1550: svapadāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyaṃ bhāṣyavido viduriti hi bhāṣyalakṣaṇamācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1554: tatrāthāto brahmajijñāsetisūtre anuvādatvaparihārāya śāstre puruṣapravṛttisiddhaye ca kartavyeti padamadhyāhāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1555: jijñāsāpadaṃ cānuṣṭhānayogyasyāntarṇītasya vicārasyopalakṣaṇamiti sthite sādhanacatuṣyayasampannasya brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya śrauto 'rthaḥ sampadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1557_1: mokṣasādhanabrahmajñānāya vedāntavākyavicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtravākyasya tātparyeṇa
GSP33nysu__1u:1558: evaṃca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgatayā 'rthataḥ sūtritasya prayojanāderupapādakaṃ bandhamithyātvamiti tadapi sūtrārtha eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1566: tena sūtrakāreṇaiva brahmajñānamanarthahetunibarhaṇaṃ sūtrayatāvidcāhetukaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1569: tasya cāhaṃ kartā bhokteti pratīyamānaṃ rūpaṃ yadi paramārthikaṃ syāt tadāsandigdhatayā vicāraviṣayatā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1571: pāramārthikaṃ niṣkrayaṃ niṣkalaṃ brahmarūpaṃ syāttato 'sya sandidhatayā viṣayatocyamānopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1572: tenātmasvarūpaṃ vicāraviṣayaṃ sūtrayatā sūtrakṛtaiva kartṛtvādyatadākārasya mithyātvaṃ sūtritaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1573: kartṛtvāderbandhasya mithyātvaṃ ca yāvatā vinā nopapadyate tadapi sūtritameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1585: ato yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ śabdasāmarthyenārthavaśādvā pratīyate sa sarvastadartha eveti bhavatyayamarthakalāpastanmahimādhigataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1596: asya śāstrasyaidaṃparyaṃ sukhaikatānasadātmakūṭasthacaitanyaikarasatāsaṃsāritvābhimatasyātmanaḥ pāramārthikaṃ svarūpamiti vedāntāḥ paryavasyantīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1597: taccāhaṃ kartā sukhī duḥkhīti pratyakṣābhimatenābādhitakalpenāvabhāsena viruddhayate /

GSP33nysu__1u:1606: yatkhalu pramitamapyanupapadyamānaṃ svopapattaye yadapekṣate tattadākṣipati nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1607: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhe 'bhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ na punaḥ śabdānityatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1610: evaṃca prayojanatayoktā muktiryadi bandhamithyātvāmapekṣeta tadā tadākṣipet /

GSP33nysu__1u:1626: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mucyata iti śrutirdarśanamokṣāvantarā kiñcinna sahata iti cenna /

GSP33nysu__1u:1639: yathā vā śrutasyaiva yāgasya svargasādhaśratvasyopapattaye 'pūrvaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1653: anādeścājñānasya nivṛttāvātmano 'pi nivṛttiḥ kiṃ na syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:1660: hanta tarhi virodhisadbhāva eva nivṛttau prayojaka iti kuta ātmanivṛttiḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:1684: astu vā jñānamajñānasyaiva nivartakamiti vyāptistathātrapa bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1690: api ca satyasyāpi viṣasya garuḍadhyānena nivṛttidarśanādbandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1696: tarhi tadeva na jñānānnivṛttamiti na mithyābhūtasyāpi jñānānnivṛttiḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:1709: yadi ca mānasī sṛṣṭiriti matam anumatametat /
GSP33nysu__1u:1734: nanu yathā mithyābhūtācchaśaviṣāṇādervyāvṛttau dhvaṃsaḥ satye paryavasyatīti bhavatocyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1735: tathā satyāccidātmano 'pi vyāvṛttau mithyābhūte paryavasyatīti mayāpi vaktuṃ śakyata eva /

GSP33nysu__1u:1743: api caivam- uktirbrahmajñānaṃ jīvagataṃ bandhaṃ nivartayatīti sautrī prayojanoktirbandhamithyātvaṃ nāpekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1744: yadi jīvajñānaṃ jīvagatasya bandhasya nivartakamiti prayojanoktiḥ sūtre syāttadā kathañcidapekṣetāpi bandhamithyātvam /

GSP33nysu__1u:1746: brahmajñānaṃ nāma tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya tatpadārthena brahmaṇaikyānubhava iti tu svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaṃ pralāpamātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:1749: api ca yadi bandhamithyātvaṃ yadi ca jñānamātrādbandhabādhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1750: tadā jñāne sati kimapi muktirnaivāpekṣata iti sadya eva sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇāṃ śarīrādinivṛttiḥ prasajyetetyarthāpattestarkavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1756: yadi hi sūtre jīvātmano viṣayatayoktiḥ syāttadā sā tasya sandigdhatāsiddhaye katṛtvādibandhamithyātvaṃ kathañcidapekṣetāpi /

GSP33nysu__1u:1777: na kevalaṃ bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate kiṃ nāma bandhasya mithyātvaṃ nāstītyapisambandhaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:1791: asiddhaṃ sādhayati pramāṇaṃ na tu pramāṇaviruddhamiti hi prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:1797: vayamapi hi bandhamithyātvamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣaviruddhatvādeva nārthāpattiprameyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1801: ceṣyādiliṅgairahamityeva yo vedya ityādyāgamaiścātmanaḥ kartṛtvādyupetasyaiva pramitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1804: nanu pratyakṣaṃ bandhasvarūpamātraṃ gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātvābhāvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1807: pratyakṣaṃ khalu bandhaṃ gocarayadastīti nāstīti vā gocarayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1819: na caitānyupakramādivaśādīdṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni kenāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33nysu__1u:1821: yeyaṃ caitanyasya svata eva sthitalakṣaṇabrahmarūpatāvabhāsaṃ pratibadhya jīvatpāpādikavidyākamarpūrvaprajñāsaṃskāracitrabhittiranādiranirvācyavidyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1823: saca cidātmano buddhayā niṣkṛṣṭa vedāntavādibhirantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirahaṃpratyayīti ca vijñānaśaktiviśeṣamāśritya gīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1827: tadevamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣe śrutyādivirodhena pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandhamithyātvavyutpādanamupapannataramityata āha- mithyātvaṃ yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1840: ata eva hyasataḥ sadajāyatetyādivākyapratipanno 'rthaḥ kutastu khalu somyaiyaṃ syātkathamasataḥ sañjāyetetyupapattiviruddhastyajyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1843: evaṃ yadi duḥkhāderātmātiriktasya samastasya mithyātvaṃ śrutyādibalena syāttarhi tasya śrutyādivākyasya tāvanmithyātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1845: anyathā svasminnevāsya prāmāṇyaṃ pratihatamiti na kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1846: yadi cedaṃ vākyaṃ mithyā syāttathāpi na duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:1858: kriyājñāne prati kārakāntarāprayojyatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarāyattamātmani svato vidyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:1864: tāṃścātmano viviktānapi vispaṣṭatayānupalabhamānastaddharmānduḥkhādīṃtsatyānevātmīyatvena paśyaṃstatkṛte nīcoccatvalakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva pratipadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1865: tato rāgadveṣābhyāṃ prayuktastadvinivṛttaye yatkaroti tadapyetādṛgevātanotītyanekayoniṣu bambhramīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1866: na kvāpyātyantikaṃ tadupaśamaṃ labhate vinā paramapuruṣārādhanāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:1870: atastannirākaraṇanirbandho yukta evetyetatparibhāvayituṃ bandhamithyātvamiti saṃmugdhe prastute 'pi duḥkhāderiti niṣkṛṣṭoktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:1875_1: puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā
GSP33nysu__1u:1878: nacānenāntaḥkaraṇaśarīrendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ taddharmāṇāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ ca mithyātvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:1917: na cāyamasti niyamo yatsmaryamāṇamaśeṣasambandhiviśeṣasahitaṃ smaryata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1921: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ saiva hi satyādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1926: atrāpi yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivadvayakhyānamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:1931: yatprakṛtipariṇāmavāci makārāntamavyayamahaṃpadaṃ na jātu tadātmani prayujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1932: yaccātmavāci dakārāntāsmacchabdajaṃ tanna kadācidapi māyāpariṇāme prayujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1933: tadevaṃ sarvamithyātvaparatve śrutereva mithyātvaprasaṅgenāsādhakatvāpattau duḥkhādibandhamithyātvāsiddhayā na pratyakṣamatattvāvedakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1939: vākyena sakṛdeva jātāyāḥ sakalamithyātvaviṣayāyā buddheḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāya parīkṣakabuddhaya eva tadviṣayaṃ buddhayā vibhajya krameṇāvagāhanta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:1942: mithyāyāḥ sādhakatvaṃ ca na siddhaṃ prativādinaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.17cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:1946: mayā mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvābhyupagamādityata āha- mithyāyā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:1954: dvitīyastu satyasyaiva sādhakatvamiti manyamāno yadīdaṃ vākyaṃ sakalamithyātvaṃ pratipādayettadā sakalāntargatatvātsvayamapi mithyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:1957: yadi caitadvākyaṃ mithyā syānna kasyāpyarthasya sādhakaṃ syādityaniṣyaprasaṅgaṃ paśyankathaṃ tvadabhyupagamamātreṇa svatarkasya viruddhatāṃ pratipadyeteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:1963: tatkimavidyamānasyāpi vākyasya nirdoṣapadāvayavatvādikaṃ vidyata iti vaktumudyato bhavān /
GSP33nysu__1u:1964: evaṃca vadatā bhavatā kasmiṃścana vipratipanne 'rthe vandhyāsutavacanaṃ pramāṇayantaṃ prativādinaṃ prati nūnaṃ padadoṣādikamevopapādya sādhakatvaṃ dūṣayiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:1965: svarūpasyaivābhāvenāsādhakatve siddhe kiṃ tatra caramabhāvinyā padadoṣādicintayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1966: nahi śabde 'vidyamānatvenaiva cākṣuṣatvasyānityatvasādhakatvābhāve siddhe kiṃ tatra caramabhāvinyā padadoṣādicintayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:1967: nahi śabde 'vidyamānatvenaiva cākṣuṣatvasyānityatvasādhakatvābhāve siddhe vyāpticintā kriyata iti cet /

GSP33nysu__1u:2515: vivādapadaṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ jñānabādhyatvādyadevaṃ tadevaṃ yathā śuktirajatamityanumānaṃ viśvasya sadasadvilakṣaṇatve mānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2525: sato bhāvātmakasya viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mama mate svayaṃ sadastyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2526: evamasato 'bhāvātmakasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2528: kiṃ nāmaivaṃ vibhāgena sadasadvailakṣaṇyasiddhayāpi pratijñātārthasiddherarthāntaratā parasya syāditi // 1 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2530: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvabhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2532: asato 'bhāvādapi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sutarāṃ bhāvābhāvabhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2535: sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi sutarāṃ svayaṃ sadeveti tenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 2 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2538: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2539: asato 'bhāvasya viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamapi bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamapi mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2541: yadi hi bhāve 'pyabhāvatvamabhāve 'pi bhāvatvamaṅgīkuryāṃ kutastadā bhāvābhāvabhedavādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2542: tathāca kathaṃ tena sādhyamānenāniṣyaṃ mama bhavet // 3 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2544: tadā sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya bhāvābhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvābhāvarūpatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2550: na bhāvatvamapītyatastena sādhitenāniṣyaṃ mama kathaṃ bhavet // 4 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2551: athaikaikasya vastuno bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ ca sādhyatayā vivakṣitamiti manvīta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2552: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasyāsato 'bhāvādvailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2553: evamasato 'bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato bhāvādvailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2564: tathāpi sato bhāvasyāpi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2569: evamasato 'bhāvarūpasyāpi viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ mama svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2574: atha bhāvābhāvābhimatayoḥ sarvathā bhāvābhāvatve na sta ityartho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2575: tathāpi sata eva bhāvasyaivāsato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2576: yatastasmādviśvasya tena sādhitena bhedavādino 'niṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2581: dvau nañau hi prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2582: evaṃ viyadādikaṃ pakṣīkṛtya bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatve sādhyamāne tasyābhāvatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2585: tathāca viśvasya bhāvābhāvavibhāgasya ca pareṇābhyupagatatvānna bhāvābhāvabhedavādino mamāniṣyaṃ kiñcit /
GSP33nysu__1u:2591: yataḥ sato bhāvasyaiva viśvasya viyadāderasato vailakṣaṇyamabhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2593: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2595: yataścāsato 'bhāvasyaiva viśvasya prāgabhāvādeḥ sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ bhāvatvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2596: ato bhedavādinastena viparītena pratijñātenāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2599: vyāvahārikabhāvatvābhāvatvagocaraṃ pramāṇaṃ tattvaviṣayeṇānumānenaiva bādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2603: viśvasya sataḥ satyādvailakṣaṇyamapi mama svayaṃ svamatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2609: sato vidyamānasyāpyasato bhedaṃ vadato mama yathā viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2610: tathā sato 'pi viśvasya sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ satāṃ bhedavādinaḥ svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2613: tadāpi sato viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sadasadbhedavādinaḥ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2617: asata eva hi sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ bhedavādino mama svayaṃ sadeva niyamena bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2618: tathāca viśvasya tena sattvānadhikaraṇatvena sādhitenāsattvāpattyā parasyaivāniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2619: aniṣyaprasaṅgena paraṃ nigṛhītavato mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // 10 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2621: athāsattvānadhikaraṇatve vādiprativādisiddhe sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapyadhikaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2623: kiñca, na sattvaṃ nāmaikamanugataṃ kintu prativastu sattvāni bhidyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2624: tatra viyadāderasadvailakṣaṇye sati sattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyamānaṃ kimekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamutānekasattvānadhikaraṇatvamatha sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2628: viśvasyāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ tāvanmama svayameva sato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ sattvānadhikaraṇatvamapi svayameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2631: tathāca siddhena tena sādhyamānena mamāniṣyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2644: yataḥ sata evāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ tadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2646: yataścāsata eva sato vailakṣaṇyamapi niyatamevātastena sādhyamānena viśvasya sadasattvāpattyā bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2649: dvayorapi sarvathā pratiṣedhātkathaṃ sadasattvaprasaṅga iti cettarhyasata eva sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sanniyatameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2650: ataḥ sadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarasato 'pi vailakṣaṇyena vyāhatena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2651: evaṃ sata evāsato 'pi vailakṣaṇyaṃ niyatamityasadvailakṣaṇyamuktavā punarviśvasya sadvailakṣaṇyapratijñā vyāhatā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2653: asmādeva hetostatsiddhiriti cettarhi mātā vandhyeti pratijñā kuto vipratiṣiddhā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2657: kiñca sata eva viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2659: atastena bādhitena sarvathā sattvānadhikaraṇatvena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2663: kecitte tavāniṣyaṃ kataṃ na bhavediti vyācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2664: tatra na pādādāviti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyamanityamiti samādhānamavaseyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2667: sanmātratvaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi tasmāt tadapi no bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.25 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2675: anekasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyamityucyate tarhi satāṃ bhedasaṃsthitistataścāpasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2686: yadi sarvasmātsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyatayocyate tarhi sadbhedasaṃsthitiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2705: yadi sattaiva nāsti tadā tadanadhikaraṇatvapratijñā vyārthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2709: santi sattādhikaraṇāni santīti cettarhi kānīti vaktavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2721: tathāhi sattāsāmānyavidhurasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ sanmātratvaṃ svarūpasattvaṃ tāvadasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2725: arthakriyākāritvaṃ jñānābādhyatvaṃ vā sattvamiti pakṣadvayaṃ sphuṭadoṣatvānna dūṣitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2733: tvayāpi dve tattve sadasidati tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā yadeva sattvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyaiva mayāpyaṅgīkārānna sacchabdārthāniruktiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2741: vijñātasyānyathā samyag vijñānaṃ hyeva tanmatam // MAnuv_1,1.26 //
GSP33nysu__1u:2748: jñānabādhyatvaṃ hi jñānanivartyatvaṃ vā pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ vā hetutvena parasyābhimatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2756: api tarhyajñānopādānakasya samāne viṣaye virodhitā jñānenopādāne nivṛtte svayameva vilapanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2758: “ajñānasya svakāryeṇa vartamānena pravilīnena vā saha jñānena nivṛttibādhaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2762: tathāvidhamapi jñānabādhyatvaṃ pakṣaikadeśe prakṛtyādau na siddhaṃ prativādina iti bhāgāsiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2764: naca vipakṣe kiñcidbādhakamastītyato 'prayojakatvājjñānabādhyatvaṃ na siddhamapi vyāpyatvāsiddhamapīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2767: sato vināśe caitanyasyāpi vināśaprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:2773: nanu ca nehanānāstītipratipannopādhau śrautaniṣedhātmā bādhaḥ prapañce 'stīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2778: kiṃ tvadabhimataṃ jñānabādhyatvamatra hetūkriyate kiṃ vāsmadabhimatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2782: hi yasmādanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānameva bādhastadviṣayatvameva tadbādhyatvaṃ matamasmākam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2784: satyo 'pyātmā dehādyātmanā vijñāto vedāntajanitasamyagvijñānavṛttiviṣaya iti pareṇāpyaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2809: bādhyatvamiti prakṛtaprakṛtyarthaṃ bādhyaṃ taditi sāmānyena parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2815: rajatatvādinā vijñātasya purovartinaḥ śuktitvādinā vijñānaṃ khalvanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:2816: evamasato rajatasya sattvādināvagatasyāsattvādinā vijñānamapyanyathāvijñātasya samyagvijñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2817: samyagvijñānaṃ bādha ityevokte sarvamapi samyagjñānaṃ bādhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:2820: anyathāvijñātasya jñānamityevokte dhārāvāhikabhrame rājatatvenāvagatasya śuktikāśakalasya punarnāgavaṅgatvādijñāne 'pi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2824: tena ghaṭasyaiva paṭādyapekṣayānyathā ghaṭatvena jñānasya punarghaṭatvena jñāne prasaṅgo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2827: evamekenānyathāvijñātasya puruṣāntarasambandhini tasyaiva vā puruṣasya kālāntarabhāvinyājānasiddhe samyagvijñāne prasaṅgo 'pīti cenmaivam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2861: tatra yāvatsu pakṣeṣu siddhāthartvaparyavasānaṃ tāvatsvanirvacanīyatvasya sattvāvirodhitvena na sanprapañcaḥ kintvanirvacanīya ityārambhāsaṅgatirdeṣo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2864: tatra sata eva sattvena pramitasyaiva viyadāderviśvasyāsadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2865: evamasata evāsattvena pramitasyaiva śuktirajatāderviśvasya sarvasyāpyāropitasya sadvilakṣaṇatvameva svayaṃ sat /
GSP33nysu__1u:2870: ato 'sambhavinā tena lakṣaṇenoktena kathaṃ te 'niṣyaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ na bhavedityādiyojanā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:2871: bhedavādina ityanena māyāvādino viyadādau sadvailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāraḥ śuktirajatādau cāsadvilakṣaṇatvābhyupagatirāgrahamātramalaivetyabhipraiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:2880: sattvenāsattvena ca vicārāsahatvamanirvacanīyatvaṃ na punaḥ sattvāsattvadharmānadhikaraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2881: brahma tu sattvena vicārasahaṃ kathamanirvacanīyaṃ syāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2883: kiñca yo viyadādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇyapi samāna iti kathaṃ na tasyānirvacanīyatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2891: tathāpi viyadādau nitye nityatvādeva śuktirajatādau cāsatvānna siddhamityavyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2892: yadi ca pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ tadapi viyadādau na siddhamityavyāptireva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2900: tatprasañjitānyathā'kāraloḍanaṃ samyagvijñānameva bādha ityavadhāraṇatayā matāntarāṇi nirastāni veditavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:2905: iha khalu kecidyathārthameva sarvavijñānamiti manyamānā nānyathākhyātiṃ sahante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2910: kiñca śuktikāyā rajatākārapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ sakāraṇa utākāraṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2917: duṣyakaraṇasaṃsargo heturiti cettathāpi kiṃ śuktitvāpagamena rajatarūpapariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2919: ādye puruṣāntareṇāpi tadā śuktitvaṃ na pratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:2922: atha punaḥ śuktayākāreṇa rajataṃ pariṇatamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:2930: kiñca doṣavaśādrajatākāreṇa pariṇatā cecchuktistadā doṣāpagame 'pi tathaiva kathaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33nysu__1u:2935: saṃyogapradhvaṃsastu na kadāpi nivartate punaḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇo mukulībhāvastu śītādinodanajanya eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:2939: kiñcotpannaṃ cedrajataṃ vinaṣṭaṃ tadā tathaiva pratītiḥ syāt na punarnedaṃ rajatamiti bādhabuddhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:2942: nahi mṛdo ghaṭākārapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ daṇḍacakrādikaṃ doṣatvena manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:2943: kiñca yasyāḥ pratītestadālambanaṃ tata eva tajjanma kiṃvā pratītyantarāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:2968: tathā hi kiṃ vastuno vastvantarātmanā satī utāsatī /
GSP33nysu__1u:2986: na tāvatsadasadbhāvamātreṇālambanaṃ sadbhāvamātrasya sarvavastupratyayasādhāraṇyena sarvapratyayānāṃ sarvārthālambanatvāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3000: yena yasyātiśaya utpadyate sa tasya viṣaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3001: atiśayo hi jñātatā vā syādvayavahāro vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3013: nahi rūpādijñānamutpādayaccakṣurākāśādinā na sannikṛṣṭata iti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3014: pratyabhijñā ca tattāsannikṛṣṭakaraṇajanyā na tadviṣayā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3020: tatra rajatajñāne śuktiravabhāsate na veti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3021: avabhāsata iti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3022: yadi saṃvidi bahumānavānneti brūyāttadā kathaṃ tacchuktikālambanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3023: kiñca rajatamavabhāsate śuktikālambanaṃ cedatiprasaṅgaḥ kataṃ pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3024: nanu rajatāvabhāsasya rajataviṣayakatve tena rajatena bhavitavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3037: na khalu jarāmaraṇavidhvaṃsaheturjātu sudhā taddheturapi bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3045: na khalu duṣyaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭaṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3050: kiñca pradarśitākāravyabhicāre pratyayasya sarvatra vyabhicāraśaṅkā durvārā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3052: tathāhi jñānameva khalu sarvatra vastuvyavasthāpakaṃ nānyat /
GSP33nysu__1u:3058: naca vācyaṃ yathā ghaṭādeḥ pārthivasya vahnivyabhicāre 'pi na dhūmasyāpi tadvayabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3061: asti hi tatra pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pyavyabhicāraniścayopāyo dhūmatvādirevāvāntaro viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3071: saṃvādakamapi jñānameveti tadapi kathaṃ saṃśayāspadaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3076: api ca pratīyamāno 'yaṃ rajatākāraḥ kutastya iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3090: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajatasmṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3092_0: tathāca rajatasmṛteḥ purovṛttigrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇātsannihitarajatajñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:3092_1: rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravataryataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3108: naca dahanakāryaṃ kathaṃ doṣaḥ karotīti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3110: jāṭharāgnipariṇatā hi rasāḥ śarīropacayahetavo na bhasmakapariṇatāstathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3118: padātpadārthasmṛtau hariharādismṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñcānubhūtaṃ tāvanna samastaṃ smaryate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3126: nanvevaṃ satyanāsvāditatiktasya śiśostiktasmaraṇānupapatteḥ kathaṃ tikto guḍa iti pratyaya iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3129: athavā nāyaṃ niyamo grahaṇasmaraṇe evāgṛhītaviveke vyavahārādipravartake iti kintu kvacidgrahaṇe eva mitho 'gṛhītabhede /
GSP33nysu__1u:3131: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya pītatvaṃ doṣavaśāddravyarahitaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3136: pittaṃ tu ājarvāvasthitaṃ kācamiva svacchaṃ na pratibandhakamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3146: tathāca tata eva sarvasyopapattau kiṃ viparyayakalpanayā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3149: tadupapattau cāgṛhītavivekasya jñānadvayasya bhrāntitvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3153: nanvatra vigītapratyayo nāma kiṃ purovartinirvikalpakajñānamuta sadṛśadarśanotthaṃ rajarasmaraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3161: tathāstyeva ca tatsamutthaṃ savikalpakamidamiti vedanātsavivādabhedābhedaṃ rajatavedanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3162: tatra vipratipannau bhedābhedau vihāyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātramidaṃ rajatamityādisāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārakāraṇaṃ pakṣatvena vivakṣitaṃ cetko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3169: bhede hi vedanayoridaṃ vedanam purovatirmātragocaram na rajatavātā vetti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3170: rajatavedanamapi rajatamātragrāhi nedamiti purovartinamanūdya tasyaiva rajatatāmidaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3175: tato vipratipannākāraṃ parityajyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātrapakṣīkāre na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3176: kathamanyathākhyātivādīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya purovartiviṣayatvasādhanāya sādhanamupanyasyannito doṣādvimucyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3177: atha rajatāthirnaḥ śuktikāyāṃ pravṛttau hetubhūtaṃ jñānaṃ mayā pakṣīkriyata iti cenmoccairvāccaḥ paro 'pi śroṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3178: īśvarajñānena siddhasādhanatā syāditi cettavāpi bādhaḥ kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3179: prakṛtapravṛttiheturanīśvarajñānaṃ pakṣīkriyata iti cenmamāpi tathaiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3180: tvayeśvarānabhyupagamādvayarthaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti cettarhi māṃ prati tavāpi kathaṃ na vyartham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3181: tathāpi vyāptijñāne siddhasādhanateti cettatraiva tava bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3187: kimidaṃ rajatajñānaṃ nāma rajatasya jñānaṃ rajatajñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3189: rajataśabdollekhijñānaṃ vā rajatārthinaḥ pravṛttihetujñānaṃ vā rajatamiti jñānaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3206: dvitīye rajatajñānaśabdena yo 'rthaḥ pareṇa vivakṣyate sa evāsmākaṃ heturbhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3207: tathā hi na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ pareṇāṅgīkartumucitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3215: yatra śuktikātadadhastadrajatamastīti vākyaṃ śrutavataḥ śuktijñānamapi rajatāthirpravṛttiheturbhavatīti tasyāpyanyathākhyātitāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3218: ato rajatajñānaṃ nāmoktapakṣeṣu kiñcidaṅgīkṛtya taddoṣo vā pariharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3221: kecitpunā rajataviṣayaṃ jñānamityeva hetvarthamupagamya rajatetarāviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamaṅgīkṛtya sādhyāviśiṣṭatādoṣaṃ pariharanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3242: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi kutaḥ sattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3246: khaṇḍo gauḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādayaḥ sarva eva savikalpakapratyayā vibhramāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33nysu__1u:3252: kiṃ guṇakriyājātyādeḥ dravyeṇota guṇādīnāmeva parasparamatha guṇāśrayasya kriyāśrayeṇetyādi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3255: na hi śuklaḥ paṭa ityasya śauklayaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimato laukikānām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3256: naca calati paṭa ityasya calanaṃ paṭa ityartho 'bhimataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3257: nāpi khaṇḍo gaurityetatkhaṇḍatvaṃ gotvaṃ ca piṇḍa evetyanena samānārtham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3259: daṇḍīti śābdavyavahāre bhedārthapratyayaprayogājjñānamapi tādṛśaṃ kalpyata iti cetsamamatrāpi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3263: ata eva śuklaḥ paṭa ityuktvā śauklayaṃ paṭasyeti vyākartāro bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3266: na hi śuklaḥ paṭaścalatītyasya śauklayaṃ paṭatvaṃ calanaṃ caikamityarthaścetasi cakāsti pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3267: tathā sati daṇḍī kuṇḍalī devadatta ityasyāpi jñānasya daṇḍakuṇḍaladevadattatvatādātmyaviṣayatāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3269: samānamekamadhikaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te hi samānādhikaraṇāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3270: tathāca guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇāṃ cābhedaḥ sphuṭa eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3277: evañca yatra bhedo na tadabhedena pratibhāsate yaccābhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bheda iti kvātivyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3278: nanu guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ cābhedo bhagavato muneḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3281: tathāca punaḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādipratyayā vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3287: yadvijñānaṃ yatsannikṛṣṭakaraṇena janyate sa tasya viṣaya ityaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3294: liṅgasya sādhyadharmisannikarṣo liṅgijñānakāraṇamiti cenna liṅgajñānasya karaṇatayābhyupagamāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3297: tathāpi pratyabhijñāyāṃ tattāṃśena cakṣurāderliṅginā ca liṅgajñānasya vākyārthena vākyajñānasya sannikarṣābhāvādaviṣayatāpattiriti cenna asannikṛṣṭajñāpane 'tiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3302: nahi saṃyogādireva sannikarṣaḥ kiṃ nāma pratyāsattimātram /
GSP33nysu__1u:3309: tarhi manaḥsannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānaṃ rūpajñānaṃ manoviṣayamāpannamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3321: astu vā yadvijñānaṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ tattadviṣayamityeva vyavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3325: nahi vayamasminpratyaye śuktitvamāvabhāsata iti brūmo yena virodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3328: virodhe vā samīcīnarajata idaṃ rajatamiti pratītirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3330: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi jñānaviṣayatā prasajyata iti cet satyam,
GSP33nysu__1u:3338: vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kuto bādha ityasato rajatatādātmyorjñānaviṣayatāmācāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3344: ādye paśuhiṃsā kiṃ dharmajanane svārasikaśaktimatī utādharmajanana iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3345: ādye kataṃ kratubāhyāpi dharmaṃ na janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3347: sahakārivaśāditi cet aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi sahakāriṇāṃ svārasikaśaktipratibandhena viparītaśaktayādhāyakatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3362: guṇā eva na te doṣā iti cet kācādayo 'pi guṇā eva na te doṣā ityuktameva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3367: tathā satīśvarajñānasya nityasyārtho viṣayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3368: pratyabhijñānasya ca tattāṃśo viṣayo na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3374: tatra vyāvartakaṃ kadācidasti rajatādikaṃ kadāpi nāstīti vaiṣamyamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3375: tatkiṃ yadākadācitsataḥ kāraṇatvaṃ pūrvakṣaṇe sato vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3379: atha nātītādirarthaḥ svasāmarthyenānumityādikaṃ vyāvartayati yena tatsattāpekṣā syāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:3382: kiñca satyasthale 'pi na sākṣātsākṣātkāraṃ prati kāraṇatvamarthasya kintvindriyasannikarṣasyaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:3383: saca yatrāsatā nopapadyate tatrārthasattāmapekṣata iti pāramparyeṇaivārthasya kāraṇatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3384: nanu tarhyasatā rajatādinā sannikarṣāyogātkathamindriyeṇa tajjñānajanmeti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:3387: yāvatkhalu vigīte pratyaye bhāsate tasya sarvasyāsattve 'satkhyātiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3390: yaccoktaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre jñānasya savartrānāśvāsa iti tat autsargikaṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyamapavādādviparyaya iti vadatā'cāryeṇaiva parihariṣyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3391: sākṣī khalu caitanyarūpo niyatayāthārthyaḥ kadācidapi saṃśayānāskandito 'ntaḥkaraṇavṛttīnāṃ yāthārthyaṃ svayameva gṛhṇāti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3393: ata evānāśvāsanirasanopāyo na jñāneṣu kaścidviśeṣo 'stīti nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3394: anyathā parasyāpi kathaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre vyavahṛtervyavahārāntare samāśvāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3396: kvacidvivekāgrahe ca kathamanyatra viśiṣṭapratyaye viśvāso bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3400: bādhakābhāvādinā viśiṣṭajñānasvarūpaniścayamaṅgīkurvāṇaḥ kathaṃ svaprakāśavijñānavādaṃ na jahyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3407: yā caivaṃ prakriyā rajatamidamityādinoktā sā jñānadvitve rajatajñānasya ca smṛtitve pramāṇābhāvādanupapannā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3410: yastu rajatajñānasya smṛtitve pariśeṣopanyāsaḥ so 'pi pratyutpannaka(kā)
GSP33nysu__1u:3413: rajatajñānavata evotpadyamānatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti cenna tathāpi rajatasaṃskāravyavahārādau vyabhicārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3420: kiñcedaṃ smaraṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ na tāvatsāmānyaṃ guṇeṣu prābhākarairabhyupagatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3437: anyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkita iti cenna tathāpi sandigdhakālātītatānistārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3441: asati bādhake na vṛthānyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkayata iti cet samaṃ prakṛte 'pīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3448: nedaṃ smṛtiriti vyavahartavyaṃ tattollekhādismṛticinhavikalatvāditi prathamaprayoge vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3451: yadapi viparyayābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuktaṃ tat vivekāgrahamātreṇa pravṛttyāderupapattau tathāstu /
GSP33nysu__1u:3453: kiñcaivamantyatantusaṃyogaparyantaṃ kāraṇakalāpamupādāya paṭo 'pi nāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tanmātreṇa sarvasyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3455: naca tena vinaikatvādipratyayopapattiriti cet viparyaye 'pyevamiti kuto gauravam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3458_0: (ta) yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatamidamiti viśiṣṭaviṣayamekameva vijñānaṃ svaprakāśatayā
GSP33nysu__1u:3458_1: vā mānasapratyakṣatayā vā sākṣiṇā vāvabhāsate tathedamapīti kuto 'sya na viśiṣṭaviṣayaikajñānatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3459: na hi tato 'sya mātrayāpi viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3461: kevalamekaṃ tādṛgviṣayasadbhāvādyathārthaṃ tadabhāvāparamayathārthamaviśiṣṭaviṣayamanekamapi tadviśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvena pratibhāsata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:3463: nāstyeva viśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvagrāhipratyaya iti cenna anubhavasiddhajñānāpalāpe smṛtyanubhavasvarūpāpalāpaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3467: kiṃ svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam utānyonyābhāvaḥ athavāvaidharmyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3481: rajatāsambhavinaḥ purovartinīdantvasya purovartyasambhavinaśca rajate rajatatvasya gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3484: sa cedaṃrajatatvayoḥ svarūpameva pareṣām iti kathaṃ tadavabhāse nāvabhāseta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3489: atha manyase purovatirno yaḥ śuktitvādidharmo rajatavyāvartako yaśca rajate vyavahitadeśatvādidharmaḥ purovartivyāvartakastayoragrahaṇaṃ pravartakamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3491: purovartino hi śuktitvāgrahe na śuktikārthī tatra pravarteta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3492: rajatasya cāsannihitatvādidharmāgrahe rajatārthī na tatra pravartatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3502: asti tāvatpravartakatvābhimatapratyaye 'pyapekṣitopāyapurovṛttyavagamāṃśayoḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedavirahādeva bhedāgrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3508: kiñca pravartakasādṛśyātpravṛttirityatraiva kalpyate uta yadyatsadṛśaṃ tattatkāryakārīti sarvatra niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3511: pravṛttilobhāditthamāsthīyata iti cenna tasyā viparyayāṅgīkārādeva suvyavasthiteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3514: nanvidaṃ rajatamiti yathā rajatasādhyā buddhī rajatasadṛśācchuktiśakalādbhavati bhavatām /
GSP33nysu__1u:3519: api cedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravartakasādṛśyamātrādyadi pravṛttimupajanayennivṛttimapi kutā ena janayet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3521: nanu ca yathā bhedāgraho bhavatāmabhedagrahaṃ janayati tathā pravṛttimapi kiṃ na janayediti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3524: jñānajanane hi kāraṇānāṃ svātantṛyaṃ na puruṣasya /
GSP33nysu__1u:3527: pravṛttau tu puruṣa eva svatantro na jñānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3528: sa hi satyapi jñāne 'pekṣita eva pravartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3533: kiñca jñānamarthe pravṛttiṃ kiṃ sākṣādupajanayati utecchāprayatnadvāreṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:3543: atha rajate pratipannena rajatatvena tatsamīhitasādhanatājñānamupajātaṃ bhedāgraha(bhedagrahe 'bhedagraha)
GSP33nysu__1u:3554: naca tatra saṃsargagrahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyo hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3559: avisaṃvādivyavahārajanakatvaviśiṣṭasākāṃkṣarūparūpisahopalambho hi talliṅgam na cāvisaṃvāditvaṃ prāk pravṛtteḥ śakyādhigamam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3560: asti cedaṃ sakalamapi pravartakaṃ vibhrame 'pīti kuto viparyayābhāve pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3564: rajatatvena sahāgṛhītāsaṃsargatayā vā rajatādagṛhītabhedatayā vā samīhitasādhanatānumānopapatteriti etadapyayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3569: nirvikalpake tu vastusvarūpamātramiti bheda iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3576: ata tadvastudarśanasāpekṣadaśarnaṃ nirvikalpake 'cakāsadapi savikalpake bhātīti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:3585: tatra kiṃ tadanvayajñānaṃ pravṛttau niyatamutāniyatamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3587: anyathākhyātiṃ vinā na rajatārthinaḥ purovartini pravṛttiriti tāvatsiddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:3590: pratibhāsamānayorasaṃsargāgrahe sati saṃsargagraho 'varjanīyasannidhiriti cenna viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3596: purovarti vā rajatajñānagocaro rajatajñānagocaro rajatānupāyatve sati tadarthipravṛttiviṣayatvātsamyagrajatavat /
GSP33nysu__1u:3597: vivādapadaṃ rajatajñānamidaṃ jñānānna bhidyate prakāśamānāttato 'prakāśamānabhedatve sati prakāśamānatvātsampratipannarajatajñānavadityādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3598: kiñca viparyayābhāve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya bādhakatvamanupapadyamānaṃ taṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3619: tatra kimidaṃ jñānatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā pratiniyataṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3631: meruḥ sarṣapa ityādivāyānmerorapi sarṣapatvena pratibhāsāddṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavaikalyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3632: anyathā tathāvidhavākyābhāsaṃ śrutavatā tatpratiṣedho na kriyetāprasaktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3634: api caivaṃ satyagniranuguṇa iti bādhitaviṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacatītyapārthakādbhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3656: anyathā śvetaketūddālakākhyāyikayā pratipāditatvādadvaitamapi na śrutyabhiprāyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3658: ityapi paropāsanānuvādo na svārthe tātparyavān syāt“atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste';
GSP33nysu__1u:3664: yata evaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ svalakṣaṇamatra sūtre brahmaṇo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:3667: ato jīvaikyamapi sa nirācakre jagadguruḥ // MAnuv_1,1.99ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3677: syādayamadvaitināmanupapanno lakṣaṇārambho yadīdaṃ jīvavyāvṛttyarthaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3678: jaḍamātravyāvṛttyarthaṃ tu lakṣaṇe vyākhyāyamāne kathaṃ jīvaikyavādināṃ lakṣaṇasūtrārambho 'nupapanna ityata āha- nahīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3679: nahi janmādihetutvaṃ jīvasya jagato bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.99cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3681: yatra hi lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatsarvaṃ tadvayāvartyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3686: kiñcānena lakṣaṇena yadi jīvo na vyāvartyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:3688: tathā sati lakṣaṇasya jīve 'tivyāptimāśaṅkayetaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiriti sūtrakārīyaṃ tannirākaraṇamasaṅgataṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3690: kathañcicchaṅkāyāṃ vā tasyāpi lakṣyatvāṅgīkāraṃ parityajya tatra na lakṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ kriyata ityāśavānāha- hitākriyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3691: hitākriyādidoṣaṃ ca vakṣyatyeva svayaṃ prabhuḥ // MAnuv_1,1.100ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3694_1: paricchinnajñānakriyāśakteḥ saṃsāriṇo hiraṇyagarbhādutpattyādi na sambhāvayitumapi śakyate'; iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3698: ito 'pi māyāvādināṃ na brahmalakṣaṇasūtrārambhaḥ sambhavatītyāha- nirguṇatvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3699: nirguṇatvaṃ ca tenaiva niṣiddhaṃ prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_1,1.100cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3702: tato 'nenāpi lakṣaṇāvākyena brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena tadavinābhūtaiḥ sarvajñatvādibhiśca saṃsargaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3704: nirviśeṣatvavādināṃ ca nirviśeṣatvaṃ niṣedhataḥ sūtrasyārambhaḥ kathamupapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3709: nahi tathāvidhaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ vā viruṇaddhi /
GSP33nysu__1u:3714: su samyak svarūpāntargatyā na lakṣaṇānīti vā tadarthopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3715: tarhi yato 'sya janmādi sā māyā tadāśrayo brahmeti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3719: nanu taṭasthenāpi jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena brahmaṇo jīvaikyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ ca (ni)
GSP33nysu__1u:3724: tatra kākādhikaraṇatvaṃ tadanadhikaraṇebhyo gṛhaṃ vyāvartayati na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3726: ādye brahmalakṣaṇamapi kathaṃ na jīvavyāvṛttiṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3727: kathaṃ ca tatsambandhena saguṇaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3729: yo hi kāryakāraṇasaṅghātādaviviktaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvadoṣasaṃsargiṇamātmānaṃ matvā kliśyati sa jīvo vyāvartyata eva te(ane)
GSP33nysu__1u:3731: tatra yaścaitanyadhātuḥ sa brahmaṇo na bhidyata ityabhyupagame virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3732: naca satyasya prapañcasya kāraṇabhūtāyāḥ satyāyā māyāyā āśrayo brahmeti sūtrārtho yena brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3733: kintu yadavaṣṭambho viśvo vivartaḥ prapañcastad brahmeti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3734: sati caivaṃ sūtrārthe kathaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ brahmaṇo nirguṇatvaṃ ca viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3740: taṭasthena jagajjanmādikāraṇatvenātra sūtre lakṣaṇayā brahma pratipādyata iti kuto 'ṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3742: na tāvad brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya bādhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadagocaratvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3750: janmādyasya yatastad brahmeti lakṣaṇayocyata iti kalpyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3753: bhedenaiva tu mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kutaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.101ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3755: yadi jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaparirakṣaṇāya yathāśrutaṃ sūtrārthaṃ parityajya lakṣaṇāśrīyate tarhi jīvabrahmaṇorbhedenaivāṅgīkṛtena sūtrasya mukhyārthasambhave lakṣaṇā kasmādāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3756: nanvabhedamupādāya sūtre lakṣaṇā vā'śrayaṇīyā bhedamupādāya makhyavṛttirveti sandihyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3757: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ dvitīyaḥ pakṣa eva śreyāniti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3768: ityādinā prakṛtaḥ prekṣāpūrvaṃ tejo 'bannādīnāṃ sraṣṭā sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ mūlamāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhā ca sakalāvadyagandhavidhuro 'paricchinnaguṇākaraḥ paramātmā,
GSP33nysu__1u:3782: nanu kiṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ mukhyamupādāya tattvaṃpadayorlākṣaṇikatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3783: kiṃvā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ gauṇaṃ gṛhītvā tattvaṃpadayormukhyārthatā vyākhyātavyeti sandehe na vinigamanāyāṃ heturasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3790: iti vākyaṃ jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ pratipādayatītyatra virodhyākāraparityāgo nāma na tāvadavivakṣāmātramityuktaṃ prāk /
GSP33nysu__1u:3800: nanu ca virodhyākāraparityāgena jīvasya brahmaikyamityasyārtho na virodhyākārāvivakṣāmātreṇeti nāpyanityatveneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3808: sadaiva guṇavattve 'sya bhinnaṃ syānnirguṇaṃ sadā // MAnuv_1,1.102ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3811: yadi nirguṇaṃ saguṇādatyantabhinnaṃ tarhyasya saguṇasya nityaṃ saguṇatvāttasmānnityameva nirguṇaṃ bhinnaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:3815: āropapravāhasya cānādinityatayā sadā saguṇatvaṃ ca nāniṣyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3818: yathā vā yadidaṃ rajataṃ sā śuktirityevaṃ pareṇa svābhisandhāvudghāṭite satyāha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3826: ato guṇarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ na sarvathā śakyanirūpaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3845: evaṃ dharmarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ nirākṛtamapyāgrahamātreṇa yo 'ṅgīkaroti taṃ prati solluṇṭhamāha- nirguṇatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3846: nirguṇatvaṃ tadā ca syādāsuratvaṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_1,1.103ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3849: ṇatve nirākṛte 'pi yadi nirguṇatvaṃ parasmai ruciṃ syāt tarhi guṇaśabdoditasakalaśubharāhityalakṣaṇamāsuratvameva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3853: nahi nānāvidhakāryakriyāveśātmatvaṃ tatprasavaśaktayatmakaṃ vā jijñāsyaviśuddhabrahmāntargataṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__1u:3861: yadapi guṇaguṇinoranyatvānanyatvābhyāmanirūpaṇāditi lakṣaṇasya taṭasthatvādi siddhaye pareṇoktaṃ taddūṣayitumanuvadati- lakṣyalakṣaṇayoriti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3868: tadubhayamapi lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyādbrahmaṇo bhinnamabhinnaṃ bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3881: naca tadeva tadaiva prasiddhamaprasiddhaṃ ceti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3899_0: tatra jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣasya sadbhāvāttadbalena
GSP33nysu__1u:3899_1: sarvamutpadyata iti vaktuṃ nirbhedavastuni pareṇa viśeṣasyānaṅgīkṛtatvāt ghaṭādīnāṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:3899_2: ca mithyātvenāṅgīkṛtānāmanudāharaṇatvātsatya eva vastunyasāvudapapādanīya iti manvāna āha- tadeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3903: yadyevaṃ pṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayasi tadaikyasya gatirnirūpaṇaprakāro na vidyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:3915: tattvamasītyādivākyapratipādyamaikyaṃ kiṃ tatpadalakṣitāccaitanyādabhinnamuta bhinnamatha bhinnābhinnamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3916: pareṇāṅgīkṛtatvena prādhānyādabhedapakṣaṃ tāvadādau nirākaroti- aikyābheda iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:3917: aikyābhede na śāstreṇa jñeyaṃ tat svaprakāśataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.104cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:3920: aikyasya caitanyasvarūpābhede 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe tadaikyaṃ tattvamasītyādinā śāstreṇa pratipādyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:3928: atha śāstraṃ naikyaṃ pratipādayati kintu bhedabhramaṃ nirākaroti,
GSP33nysu__1u:3952: nanu kathaṃ tarhi so 'yaṃ devadatta iti vākyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3955: bhede mithyātvato bhedasatyatvaṃ syād balādapi // MAnuv_1,1.105ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:3969: nanu na kutrāpi satayo bhedo 'smābhirabhyupeyate tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:3972: yayordūrasthayorvanaspatyoraikyaṃ mithyā tayorbhedaḥ satya iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:3973_0: athavā yasya svarūpeṇa sato yo 'bhāvo mithyā tasya tadviparītaḥ satyo yathā brahmaṇo
GSP33nysu__1u:3979: tadā vaktavyaṃ tau kiṃ caitanyādabhinnāvuta bhinnau atha bhinnābhinnāviti /
GSP33nysu__1u:3986: sa bhedaḥ kiṃ bhedibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno bhinnābhinno vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3991: nanu bhedasya bhedāntaraṃ bhedābhedayośca bhedābhedāntaramityetāvatā nānavasthā /
GSP33nysu__1u:3995: yadyapi bhedābhedāṅgīkāre virodho vaktuṃ śakyate tathāpi sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4005: tadā pṛcchāmaḥ svasya nirvāhakaṃ hi svanirvāhakaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ svanirvāhakatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4008: tathā caikasyaivaikasyāmeva nirvāhakriyāyāṃ karmakartṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4009: tannirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca parasparaṃ dharmiṇā kriyayā cātyantābhinnamu(tātyaṃ)
GSP33nysu__1u:4012: paryāyo bhedavān vā syādanavasthobhayatra ca // MAnuv_1,1.106b-d //
GSP33nysu__1u:4014: nirvāhyamiti nirvāhakamiti apiśabdānnirvāhakamityapi śabdasamūhaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta ekārthatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4019: yadi nirvāhyatvādirarthaḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇā na bhedavān syāttadā tadbhedadvayasya bhedisvarūpamātratve paryāyatvādidoṣaprasaṅgādbhedāntaravadityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4020: tathāca parasparaṃ bhedaṃ dharmibhedaṃ vā'śrityobhayatrānavasthā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:4027: satyajñānādikaṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantābhinnaṃ vā bhinnaṃ vā bhinnābhinnaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:4039: nanu satyajñānādīnāṃ parasparaṃ brahmaṇā cātyantamabheda eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4042: parāparasāmānyavācināṃ saguṇabrahmavācināṃ vā teṣāṃ parabrahmaṇi lakṣaṇayā pravṛttyaṅgīkārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4043: naca vācyaṃ satyapadena lakṣitasyaiva jñānapadena lakṣaṇāyāṃ vaiyarthyāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:4056: brahmaviśeṣaṇatvenāsatyatvādivyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ satyādipadānāṃ tvayā vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4061: vyāvṛttervyāvṛttasya brahmaṇo 'viśeṣatve sā svatantrā vyāvṛttirna prayojanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4063: mumukṣuṇā brahma vā taddharmo vā jijñāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4074: viśeṣaṇābhidhānamukhena vyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4078: asatyatvādivyāvṛttiḥ padānāṃ prayojanamiti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4079: nahi tīre nadītvamanabhidadhato nadīpadasyānadītvavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4083: nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśamāne virodhyākārāropa evānupapanna iti coktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4087: tattasmādakhaṇḍaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ vākyadvayapratipādyamityetanmataṃ khaṇḍitaṃ dūṣitaṃ veditavyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4097: viśeṣābhāvo hi nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti vākyena pratipādayitumiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4099: ayamapi viśeṣo nirviśeṣamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4101: tarhyetadvacanakartṛtvamapi mūko 'hamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4122: ata uktaprakāreṇa mahāvākyāvāntaravākyayoranyathānupapattibalādbhedarahite 'pi brahmaṇyayamanupapattiśāntiheturviśeṣo nāma śaktiviśeṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4128: yato bhedahīne 'pi vastunyasti kaścicchaktiviśeṣo yena prakāśamānamapi na prakāśata ityādi yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4129: sa ca viśeṣo 'nayaivārthāpattyāvagamyata ityeva tvayā vaktavyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4132: so 'pi hi viśeṣo yadi vastuno bhinnastarhi bhedānavasthādi doṣaḥ syādabhinnatve ca viśeṣatadvadbhāvānupapattestādavasthyādityata āha- viśeṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4138: sa eva viśeṣo viśeṣāntaramantareṇa viśeṣatadvadbhāvaṃ ca ghaṭayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4139: ekasyaiva nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca tadbalādeva siddhayatītyaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4141: nanvabhinne vastuni bhedakāryanirvāhakatvaṃ viśeṣasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt(taḥ)
GSP33nysu__1u:4153: etadubhayānyathānupapattyā bhedarahite 'pi caitanye bhedrapratinidhistatkāyarkārī kaścidatiśayo 'stīti kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4156: asau siddha iti kiṃ tatra pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇeneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4166: tathā hi paṭastacchauklayaṃ ca tāvanna bhidyete /
GSP33nysu__1u:4172: nāpi kuṇḍamiva paṭo 'dhikaraṇatvena badarāṇīva śauklayamādheyatvena parisphurati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4196_1: 'pi paṭe 'sti kaścidatiśayo bhedapratinidhiryadvaśādidaṃ sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ syādityeva kalpanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4199: nanu bhedābhedāṅgīkāreṇānupapatteḥ śamanāt kiṃ viśeṣeṇeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4209: prāptaṃ tarhi sakalavastūnāmaikyamityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4214: te prakṛtasvarūpā viśeṣā aśeṣato vastuṣvananteṣu dravyeṣvanantā eva santi /
GSP33nysu__1u:4217: nanvekaikasmiṃśca dravye viśeṣo 'pyekaiko 'sti tadā paṭo mahāṃśchuklaścalatīti vicitrānekavyavahārānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4220: tataśca viśeṣāṅgīkāro vyarthaḥ syādityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4221: te 'pyuktalakṣaṇā viśeṣā aśeṣato 'pi vastuṣu pratyekamanantāḥ santyato noktadoṣāvakāśaḥ anantā ityupalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4222: yatra yāvanto vyavahārāstatra tāvanto viśeṣā iti jñātavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4225: tathāca bhinnanāṃ dravyābhede dravyasyāpi bhedaprasaṅga ityata āha- parampareti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4231: sarvaṃ caitadviśeṣasvarūpasādhakārthāpattyaiva siddhamiti na pṛthak pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4237: tathāpi vipratipanno na tanmātreṇa bodhayituṃ śakyata ityarthāpattirupanyasteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4243: yatpareṇa pṛṣṭaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇayorbheda ityādi tasyedamuttaram- brahma nirbhedamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4251: brahma ca guṇāścetyapunaruktabhaṇanaṃ ca yujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4253: tvameva brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamabhipretya tatsādhanāya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ pravṛttamiti sūcayitum /
GSP33nysu__1u:4254: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya svalakṣaṇatve bādhakābhāvānna taṭasthatvakalpanaṃ yuktamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4259: yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyo nirākariṣyata iti nāṅgīkārārhastadā guṇaguṇinoreva sa kaścittādṛśaḥ svabhāvabheda ityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4260: nahi paṭādau bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣabalādvayavahāraviśeṣadarśanamātreṇa brahmaṇyapi tathā kalpayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4277: mūlaśrutyaṅgīkāre saiva viśeṣābhidhātrī bhaviṣyatīti pramitametannirbhedameva brahma viśeṣabalādeva nānāvyavahārālambanamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4279: atra yatpareṇa jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇo nimittatvamevotopādānatvamevāthobhayamapīti vimṛśya tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ (pari)gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4283: tasmāduktalakṣaṇadvayopapannaṃ brahma nārāyaṇākhyaṃ mumukṣuṇā jijñāsyamiti sthitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4292: tasya harahiraṇyagarbhādicetaneṣu pradhānādyacetaneṣu ca pāśupatādyāgamānumānāvaṣṭambhenātivyāptimāśaṅkyātra pariharati bhagavāntsūtrakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4315: aparastu saṅkalpavargādyapratyakṣaphalāni vidadhānaḥ śivasya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasarvajñatvasavarśaktitvasatyasaṅkalpatvādyaśeṣaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ niravadyatvaṃ ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4323: tataśca tatpraṇetuḥ śivasya paramāptatvamavadhārya taddṛṣṭāntena tatpraṇītasya dvitīyasyāpyāgamasya prāmāṇyamavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4329: anayaiva diśā tattadāgamaprāmāṇyaṃ tattaddevatāvādināṃ pratyavasthānāni draṣṭavyāni /
GSP33nysu__1u:4341: ityādibhiranumānairviśvodayasthitilayakartari sāmānyataḥ siddhe asmadādīnāṃ tadasambhavāt bhagavāṃśchiva eva pariśeṣājjagajjanmādikartā siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4342: yathā ca (vi)citrādikāryadaśarnāttadanuguṇa eva kartā kalpyate evaṃ vicitrānekakāryadaśarnāt(nena)
GSP33nysu__1u:4344: athavā kṣityādikaṃ kartetyadantargatameva savarjñatvādikaṃ na yatnāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4353: ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvāścetyādinoktaṃ śāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇamabhivyañjakaṃ pramāṇamasyeti śāstrayoni tasya bhāvaḥ śāstrayonitvaṃ tasmāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:4361: ityāśaṅkaya sautrahetusiddhaye śaivādyāgamagamyatvaṃ tāvannirācikīrṣustatprāmāṇyasādhakaṃ paropanyastamanumānamapākaroti- iti cediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4366: tadgaḥ pratyakṣāvagataścāsau vyabhicāraḥ phalavyabhicāraśca so 'syastīti tadgavyabhicārivākyaṃ tena dṛṣṭāntabhūtena śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatvā(vagamahetubhūtā)
GSP33nysu__1u:4369: yadi pratyakṣasaṃvādena dṛṣṭārthānāṃ śivādivākyānāṃ prāmāṇyamanumāya taddṛṣṭāntenādṛṣṭārthānāmapi śivādivākyatvena hetunā prāmāṇyamanumīyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:4370: tarhi dṛṣṭārtheṣveva vākyeṣu yatpratyakṣata eva phalavyabhicāravaddṛśyate tasya,

GSP33nysu__1u:4377: phalavyabhicārastu kartṛkarmādivaiguṇyanimitta iti cettarhi tadapi vākyamapramāṇameva phalasaṃvāsadastu kākatālīyo vā jagadvayāmohakānāṃ śivādīnāṃ guḍajihvikā vetyastu /

GSP33nysu__1u:4387: atha tadanumānamaprayojakaṃ hiraṇyagarbhavākyatve 'pyāgantukena vipralambhādīnāṃ doṣeṇaikasyāprāmāṇyasambhavāditi cet /

GSP33nysu__1u:4414: kathañcidasya hetuviśeṣaṇatve sādhanavaikalyaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4434: tarhyutpattyanantarameva kiṃ na kuryāditi cet na /
GSP33nysu__1u:4450: anyathā kathaṃ bhūtale ghaṭabhāvābhāvau yugapatsambhavata itrata cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:4453: pakṣiṇo bhāvābhāvau yugapaditi tatrāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4456: khananādinā yeṣāṃ vibhāgo nodanādinā ca yeṣāṃ saṃyogaste kṣityādīnāmavayavāḥ pratyakṣasiddhā iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:4457: tatkiṃ saṃyogavibhāgisajatīyadravyāntaravattvaṃ sāvayavatvamityuktaṃ bhavati uta tadārabdhatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4475: anayaiva diśā sarvāṇi jagatkāraṇamātrasādhanāni svatantratānumānāni nirasanīyāni(iti) /
GSP33nysu__1u:4477: yacca śivādīnāṃ jagatkāraṇatve pariśeṣānumānaṃ tadapi kiṃ śāstrānusāri kiṃvā kevalam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4481: īśvare śive jagatkartari ca pṛthaganumānaṃ na mānamityarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:4547: prasiddhakartṛrahitaṃ vanaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityādinā yo vanādikartā siddhaḥ tenaivākāreṇa taṃ pakṣīkṛtya prayoge na ko 'pi doṣa ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4551: sa evakṣityādikarteti kathaṃ na sārvajñyamiti cenna /

GSP33nysu__1u:4643: tarhi jagatkāraṇatvameva tena kiṃ na sādhyate /

GSP33nysu__1u:4672: kiñca vede jñānakaraṇatvaśaktirbrahmaṇi ca tatkartṛtvaśaktiriti kiṃ kena saṅgatam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4684: tathāpi śāstrata evānyeṣāṃ harahiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ ca jagatkāraṇatvapratīterativyāpakamidaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4687: yadyapi nāmāni sarvāṇītyādiśrutyā śivādināmnāṃ viṣṇau śaktimātramavasīyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4689: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti hi nyāyaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:4709: yatrāpi pratīvyākhyāne na vyabhicaratastatrāpyupakramādyanusandhānapūrvakatvenaiva na tu svataḥ /
