GSP33nysu__1u:4722: upakramādīnāṃ śrutyādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāṃ sāvakāśatvādinā ca balābalaviniścayapuraḥsaraṃ virodhe balavatā durbalabādhayā vākyārthavimarśaḥ samyak pravicāraṇam /

GSP33nysu__1u:4739_2: jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena śāstrayoni na tu harahiraṇyagarbhādaya iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4741: tatra ca śāstraṃ pramāṇīkriyamāṇaṃ vacanavṛttyā sarvameva ca yuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4749: nanu janmādyasya yata iti yacchabdaśravaṇāttadbrahmeti prakṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4754: naca tasya tadityanuktau anvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:4763: saṃśabdena sakalapadānāṃ lakṣaṇayā brahmaprātipadikārthamātraparatvamucyata iti vyākhyānamakhaṇḍārthanirāsena nirastam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4766: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇapadavākyātmakāśeṣaśāstrapratipādyaṃ nārāyaṇākhyaṃ brahmaiveti susthaṃ lakṣaṇamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:4789: apara āha na sarvaśāstrapratipādyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścayopāyābhāvāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:4798: ityato na sarvaśāstraprāmāṇyājjagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ samastaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahma siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__1u:4799: ityevaṃ prāpte avācyatvaśaṅkāṃ tāvannirācaṣṭe sūtrakāraḥ- īkṣaternāśabdamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4804: na cāvivakṣitārthaṃ śabdamātraṃ brahmaṇo vācyatve heturbhavitumarhatīti tadartho 'nenopalakṣyate /

GSP33nysu__1u:4810: tasmādīkṣaṇakarmatvameva hetutayā vivakṣitam ityāśayenoktam- īkṣaṇīyatvata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4815: na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdo yasya tadaśabdam /

GSP33nysu__1u:4829: vācyamiti tu pratijñāte parapakṣapratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4836: īkṣaṇīyatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ“sa etasmājjīvadhanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate'“ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet';
GSP33nysu__1u:4852: tathāca prakārāntarābhāve sati yadi brahma vācyamapi na bhavettadekṣaṇīyamapi na bhavediti bādhakaṃ sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:4855: yat yatkārakāviṣayaḥ tat tatkriyāviṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhārādyaviṣayo gaganaṃ na chidāviṣaya iti sāmānyavyāptisambhavācca /
GSP33nysu__1u:4866: hi yasmādanyathā vācyatvābhāve lakṣyatvaṃ kvāpi na dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4869: kenacicchabdena vācyameva hi tīrādikaṃ kenacillakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4881: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4886: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
GSP33nysu__1u:4887: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4892: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:4896: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4899: tasmādvipakṣe 'navasthālakṣaṇabādhakasadbhāvādavācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi yukto 'tiprasaṅga iti /

GSP33nysu__1u:4912: tenāpi cenna vācyaṃ kintu lakṣyameva tarhi punaḥ kiṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttatvācchabdāntarameva vācyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4915: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:4918: tasmādvipakṣe 'navasthālakṣaṇabādhakasadbhāvādavācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi yukto 'tiprasaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:4927: ato 'vācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgaḥ praśithilamūlaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:4941: nahi gośabdo 'nekārtha iti na kasyapi vācakaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:4955_0: yathā ca dhvaniviśeṣāṇāṃ mandavyutpattibhiraviditā api śrutisvarajātirāgādiśabdā
GSP33nysu__1u:4955_2: prasiddhā vācakāḥ śabdāḥ kathaṃ na syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4957: iti vacanamātmano vyutpattyabhāvakhyāpanārthaṃ śāradānindayā pratyavāyārjanārthaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:4963: yathoktam“vākyārtho lakṣyamāṇo hi sarvatraiveti naḥ sthitiḥ'; /
GSP33nysu__1u:4967: ato laukikavākyārthavadavācyamapi lakṣyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha- vākyārtho 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4975: kintu kenacicchabdena vācyameva kenacicchabdena lakṣyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:4978: brahmaṇo vākyārthatvaṃ tu saṃsargatvasya saṃsṛṣṭatvasya vānaṅgīkārādayuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:4981: evaṃ vyabhicāraṃ nirasya susthā prasaṅgamūlabhūtā vyāptirityāha- nāvācyamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:4985: athavā brahmaṇo 'vācyatve tasya vastutvameva na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:5002: tathāca yata ityādikaiḥ padairbrahmaiva vadankathaṃ punastasyāvācyatvaṃ śrutyarthatayā brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:5007: syādevaṃ svakriyāvirodho yadi yata ityādiśabdairbrahma vacanavṛttyoktavā tasyāvācyatvamucyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:5009: kiṃ nāma yata ityādiśabdairlakṣyamevetyataḥ kvāsti svakriyāvirodha ityata āha- yeneti //

GSP33nysu__1u:5015: atha yāvatpadajātaṃ brahmaṇi prayujyate tatsarvamapi lakṣaṇayaiveti parihāre kuto 'navastheti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:5017_0: nahi praśnaparihārakramanimitteyamanavasthā yena sakṛdevottareṇa nivarteta kintu

GSP33nysu__1u:8459: athavā antaḥsthatvādhikaraṇenedaṃ gatārthamityāśaṅkaya tatra candrādikatipayapadārthāntarasthitatvam atra tu sarvapadārthāntargatatvamabhidhīyata iti pratipādyabhedametenāha /
GSP33nysu__1u:8464: tadatra yadi sādhyaṃ syāttadā 'rbhakaukastvādityākṣepānupapattiradṛśyatvādyadhikaraṇena gatārthatā e(?)
GSP33nysu__1u:8472: prakṛṣṭo bodho yasmāditi vā pacādyajantatvena vā prabodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8479: ātmānaṃ parasmai śaṃsatīti śaṃsanakriyāyāmātmanaḥ sarvagatasya karmatvena śarīrasya kartṛtvena vyapadeśācca na śārīro 'yaṃ sarvagataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8481: nahi devadattaḥ chidāyāṃ kartā karmāpi bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8482: tatra kiṃ karmakartṛbhāvo bhedavyāpta uta neti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8490: tathātve ca devadattaṃ grāmaṃ gacchatīti dvitīyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8494: yato devadatto grāmaṃ gacchati tasyāpi devadattasamavetagatikriyāphalavibhāgaśālitvena karmatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8495: tathāca devadattaḥ kauśāmbīṃ pāṭalīputraṃ gacchatīti prayogaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8545: atha jñānāśrayaḥ kartā sukhādiviśiṣṭaḥ karmeti cet, (na) /
GSP33nysu__1u:8547: kiṃ ca yuñjānasya nirupādhikamātmānaṃ paśyato 'haṃpratyayo nānyakarmaka ityakarmako vā'tmakarmako vābhyupagantavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8550: aparastu ghaṭādisannikṛṣṭena cakṣurādinopajanitaṃ vijñānaṃ tritayaprakāśarūpaṃ karmatayā viṣayam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8562: naca tadeva svātmānaṃ prati pūrvamaparaṃ ceti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8585: prakāśamānaṃ karmatayaiva prakāśata iti vadantaṃ prati viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8587: kiṃ cātmā yadi tadaviṣayo 'pi tatra prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8588: hanta tarhi rūpajñāne raso 'pi kasmānna prakāśate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8599: tadevaṃ kartṛkarmabhāvo na bhedavyāpta iti siddham /
GSP33nysu__1u:8605: yāvekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ karmakartārau tayorbheda ityastyeva vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8608: tataḥ kiṃ labdhamiti ceddoṣadvayaṃ parihṛtamiti krameṇāha- abhedo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8609: abhedo 'pi viśeṣe syād balī so 'pyanapoditaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.3cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:8619: yathā hi na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtānītyautsargiko bhūtahiṃsāniṣedho 'gnīṣomīyapaśuhiṃsāvidhināpodyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8621: nanvevaṃ tarhi prameyatvānityatvayorapyevaṃ vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:8627: sāmānyaviṣayeṇa hi pramāṇenārthe pratīte sati viśeṣaviṣayeṇāpavādo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8628: tataśca sarvataḥ prasaktā buddhistadviṣayaṃ parityajyānyatra viśrāmyati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8629: naca sarvabhūtahiṃsāniṣedhasyeva prameyatvānityatvavyāpteḥ kenāpi pramāṇena prāptirasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8633: evaṃ tarhi karmarkatṛbhāvo 'pi bhedābhedābhyāṃ saha vyavasthita evopalabdha iti kathamatrāpyutsargāpavādanyāyasyāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8636: sa tāvadāpātato virodhādbhedena ghaṭanīyo vā viśeṣeṇa vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8640: ato bhedaḥ sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti viśeṣastvapavādeneti yuktamuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8642: sopādhikasambandhasya sādhanāṅgatābhāvavat sopādhikavyabhicārasyāpi na dūṣaṇāṅgatvamiti kimatrālaukikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8651: etad bhāvābhidhaṃ liṅgaṃ kriyāliṅge tataḥ param /
GSP33nysu__1u:8656: yāvantaḥ śabdāḥ kvacitpratīke sthitivācinaste sarve 'pyanenopalakṣyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8669: ata eva kriyā kriyayā bhāvo bhāvena vyākhyāyata iti parāstam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8673: ityadhikaraṇe pratipādyā śrutirnāma na tu liṅgam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8674: tarhi pādāntarbhāvo na sambhavatītyata uktam- liṅgādhiketi //
GSP33nysu__1u:8676: yathā prathamapāde 'ntastaddharmopadeśāditi liṅganirṇayo bahunāmasamanvayalābhārthaḥ tathā bahuliṅgasamanvayalābhārtho nāmavicāro 'tra na viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8687: atra“yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8688: mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ';
GSP33nysu__1u:8700: kiñca carācaragrahaṇāditi heturatra sarvaṃ vāttīti kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8702: nanvevaṃ tarhi śrutyanugamāya sarvagrahaṇāditi kuto na kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8712: lakṣaṇaṃ ca lakṣyeṇa brahmaṇābhinnamiti lakṣaṇasūtre pratipāditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8715: anityatvāt kriyāṇāṃ tu kathameva svarūpatā // MAnuv_1,2.5cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:8724: yatkhalu yasya janakaṃ na tasyāsau janako,
GSP33nysu__1u:8725: yacca tasya vināśakaṃ na tasyāsau vināśaka iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8730: tato yadi nāma sarvagatatvādīnāṃ yāvaddravyabhāvināmabhedaḥ tathāpi na kriyāṇāmasau yujyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8733: iti cet sa viśeṣo 'pi kriyāśaktayātmanā sthiraḥ // MAnuv_1,2.6ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:8738: na kevalamīśvaraḥ sthiro 'pi tu sa tadīyo viśeṣo dharmo 'pi kriyārūpaḥ sthitaro yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8739: atra(tu) kriyāsthiretyetāvadeva vaktavyaṃ viśeṣa iti tu kriyāyāḥ parameśvaraikye 'pyuktavakṣyamāṇanyāyena taddharmatayāpyaṅgīkaraṇīyeti jñāpayitum /
GSP33nysu__1u:8740: na kevalaṃ sa viśeṣaḥ sarvagatatvādiḥ sthiraḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:8741: kintu kriyāpi pārameśvarī sthirā yata iti vā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8748: īśvarasya tatkriyāyāśca apratyakṣatvena tadanityatvasya pratyakṣeṇa pratyetumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8760: kriyātvasya nityatvena vinā vṛttau bādhakābhāvādaprayojakatā ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:8773: kiñca nityo 'pi īśvaraparispandaḥ kadācidabhivyakteḥ kadācidevopalabhyata ityaṅgīkāre na bādhakaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8778: na hīśvaraparispandakriyā kadāpi na saṃyogavibhāgalakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:8795: evaṃ ca yathānekakālavartinyapi kriyā kadācitsaṃyogādyārabhate na yāvatsattvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8808: astu tarhi nityatve bādhakasadbhāvāditi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8810: yadi sṛṣṭisamaye 'pi saṃhārakriyā vidyeta tadā tathaiva śrutyādāvupalabhyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:8812: kiñca yadīśvarakriyā nityā syāttarhi kriyāyāḥ saṃyogavibhāgau prati anapekṣakāraṇatvāttadutpattisātatyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:8813: api ceśvarakriyā saṃyogavibhāgau karoti na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8817: svasattāyā idaṃ prathamatābhāvena saṃyogādiviśeṣasya vivakṣitakṣaṇādapi pūrvamutpattiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8820: uttarasaṃyogasya karmavināśakatvena kṛtasaṃyogasya karmaṇo 'vasthānānupapatteścetyata uktaṃ śaktayātmaneti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8823: ataḥ tena rūpeṇa sthirā sā yadā vyajyate tadā vyavahārālambanaṃ tattatkāryajananī ca bhavatīti na kaściddoṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8835: yadi sṛṣṭisamaye 'pi saṃhārakriyā syāttadā tathā vyavahriyeteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8838: yadapi jananavināśau yugapatsyātāmiti tadapi vyaktayavasthāyāmeva śakterjanakatvādanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8839: yacca kriyāyā nityatve saṃyogavibhāgotpattisātatyaprasañjanaṃ tadapyevameva parihṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8842: nanu kiṃ sāmagrī tameva paṭaṃ punarjanayatu(yet)
GSP33nysu__1u:8845: paṭaprāgabhāvasyāpi sāmagrīniviṣṭatvāttasya ca paṭotpattyā vinaṣṭatvena sāmagṣā vikalatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8851: yadapīśvarakriyā saṃyogavibhāgau karoti na veti pṛṣṭham /
GSP33nysu__1u:8860: nanu saṃhārakāle kriyā vyaktā (atha) na vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:8868: nityamapi parameśvarecchādikaṃ sahakārisadbhāva eva kāryakārīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:8871: necchādimātraṃ saṃhārādikāraṇaṃ kintu sañjihīrṣādikam uta saṃhārādiviśeṣaviśiṣṭaṃ tadeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:8877: sati saṃhārādau sañjihīrṣādikaṃ tataḥ saṃhārādiriti parasparāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8888: nanu pārameśvarī jñānādilakṣaṇā saṃhārādikriyā pareṇāpi nityetyaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8900: mahato mahattvamapi paramapūjyatvamiti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8901: virodhādubhayāṅgīkāro nocita iti cet tarhi prathamaprāptatvādaṇutvameva grāhyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:8908: dvitīye tvanivṛttaḥ sadā vyavahārādiprasaṅga ityata āha- śaktiteti /
GSP33nysu__1u:8913: sa ca viśeṣaḥ parasparaṃ viśeṣiṇā ca yadi bhinnaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:8914: tadā śaktivyaktayorapi kiṃ bhedo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:8930: asti tu parameśvarādikriyāyā nityatve tadityāha- kriyādiśceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8931: ... kriyādiśca svabhāva iti hi śrutiḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:8938: jñānaṃ nityaṃ kriyā nityā balaṃ śaktiḥ parātmanaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.7cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:8942: athavā pūrvā śrutiḥ śaktireva kriyetyatra paṭhitā uttarā tu kriyāyā nityatve /
GSP33nysu__1u:8947: anyakriyā kimanityaivetyato vivekaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa darśayati- śaktīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:8955: tataśca jñānakriyādiśaktiḥ yāvatkālabhāvinī tāvatkālabhāvi jñānādikamapītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:8964: sphoṭādikāryaṃ prati śaktimānapi dahano dehasaṃyogādisahakārivirahāt na tadajījanaditi /
GSP33nysu__1u:8999: kriyāpratīteranumititvaṃ indriyavyāpārasya cānyatropakṣīṇatvaṃ apratyakṣatāyāṃ pramāṇataḥ siddhāyāṃ kalpyate anyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:9025: kiṃ ca paramāṇukarmāpratyakṣatāyāmapi tadeva prayojakaṃ kiṃ na kalpyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9027: ekasyāmapi karmavyaktāvutpannāyāṃ calatītipratyayaḥ syāt, iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9031: tarhi karmaṇo 'pi tathā kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9034: paṭagrahaṇa eva ca indriyavyāpāropayoga ityapi kalpanāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9036: api(?) ca saṃyogavibhāgau dvayāśrayāviti parasya matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9042: nipatataḥ śyenasya pūrvadeśavibhāgotpattau utpatataścottaradeśasaṃyogajanane sthāṇukarmaṇaḥ kāraṇatāyogāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9046: sthāṇukarmaṇā hi śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogavibhāgotpattyanupapattau karmāntarameva tadanuguṇaṃ śyene kalpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9048: yadgataṃ hi kāryamupalabhyate tadgataṃ kāraṇamapītyautsargiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9049: śyenakarmaṇaiva kalpitena sarvasyopapattau na sthāṇukarmopayoga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:9051: tathāhi, kiṃ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvadapyupayoge satyeva liṅgamanumāpakaṃ ityetāvatyanumānasāmagrī,
GSP33nysu__1u:9054: kiñca yo yenanāvinābhūtaḥ sa kvacidupalabhyamāno 'nupayogāttaṃ na gamayatītyalaukikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9055: dvitīye tu kathaṃ na sthāṇau karmānumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9064: iha tu saṃyogavibhāgalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa sthāṇāveva karmaṇyanumite kathaṃ kalpanāgauraveṇa tadapanayanam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9070: atra hi sthāṇau pratītau saṃyogavibhāgāvakāraṇakāveva syātāmiti vā śaṅkanīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9074: tattadavayavagataparityāgenānyagatasya kāraṇatāyāḥ kvāpyanupalabdhatvena nirmūlāyāḥ śaṅkāyā anudayāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9079: kiñca saṃyogādinā kriyānumāne yāvatsattvaṃ calati pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9090: api cāpratyakṣe vyomni saṃyogavibhāgāvapi apratyakṣāviti patati patatrī gagana iti pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9091: viyati vitatālokāvayavini bahuvihagavibhāgasaṃyoganibandhano 'sau pratyaya iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:9096: yadi ca mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyeva devadattasyāpi gatiranumeyā syāt tadobhayatrāpi calatipratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9099: api ca kārmakāraṇādeva saṃyogavibhāgotpattyupapattau kiṃ madhye karmakalpanayetyanavakḷptireva karmaṇaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9101: tasya saṃyogaviśeṣādeḥ svāśraye tatsamavete vā kāryārambhakatvasyānyatra niścitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9109: tarhi tathaiva paratrārambhakatvamapi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9120: // oṃ guhāṃ praviṣyāvātmānau hi taddarśanāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__1u:9121: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33nysu__1u:9122: ṛtaṃ pibantāviti vākyaṃ kiṃ jīveśvarau pratipādayati kiṃvā parameśvarameveti saṃśaye jīveśvarāviti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9128: jīveśvarapakṣe tu chatrinyāyenopacāro bhaviṣyatītyevaṃ prāpte paramātmānamekameva pratipādayatīdaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:9139: naca paramātmani svagatabhedo yujyata iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:9142: sā ca paramātmanyabhedena ekatvasaṅkhayayā ca viruddhayata iti cet, na /
GSP33nysu__1u:9144: atha dvitvaṃ dravyāntaravidhurasya na yujyate virodhāditi matam /
GSP33nysu__1u:9147: kintu dvitvaṃ caikasya nirbhedasya ekatvādhāramātrasya ca yujyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:9149: kathamityapekṣāyāṃ tatpradaśarnāya viśeṣaṇācceti sūtraṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe- yaḥ seturiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9170: iti paramātmanyeva samanvayaṃ pratijñātavatā sūtrakāreṇa sa eva vivaraṇavākyaiḥ prapañcanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9172: bādhake sati nāyaṃ doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:9199: sūtre bhāvasyaiva pratijñānāt kriyayā anukterityato 'ntaraśabdamubhayārthatayā vyākhyāti- antariti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9217: tatkathaṃ śrutāvanuktaṃ ramaṇakartṛtvaṃ sūtrakṛtā pratijñāyata ityata āha- ramaṇaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9220: na kevalaṃ sūtre 'pi tu śrutau ceti dvitīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9222: ādeyam upādeyaṃ sukhaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ ca māti anubhavatīti nirvacanenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9240: yadi hi sukhābhidhānādityeva brūyāt tadā sukhasyānyatrāpi sadbhāvena vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:9246: sukhena śreṣṭho hi tadā syāt yadi tatsukhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhavedityarthād,
GSP33nysu__1u:9252: svarūpeṇāpi sukhena viśeṣaśaktayā tadvān bhavatīti jñāpayitumiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9256: uktā ca sukhasya viśiṣṭatā śrutāvityāha- brahmatvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9268: akṣyādityayoragnireva niyāmakatayātrocyata iti yat pūrvapakṣiṇoktaṃ tannirākartuṃ sūtram- anavasthiterasambhavācca netara iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9271: jīvasyāgnerjīvāntaraniyāmakatve tasyāpi niyāmakāntareṇa bhāvyamityanavasthiteḥ ubhayorjīvatvasāmyena niyamyaniyāmakabhāvāsambhavācca nāgnirakṣyādityasthatayā atrocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9275: tatra yadi parasyānavisthityasambhavau asmākamapi kuto na bhavataḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9277: tathā na parasyāpītyataḥ sūtraṃ samyagvyākhyātuṃ pīṭhamāracayati- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9290: nanu brahmādīnāṃ niyāmakatvaṃ mānuṣādīnāṃ niyamyatvamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ teṣāṃ svabhāva eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:9293: svamate ca kā nāma parameśvarāpekṣetyata āha- cetanānāmiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9309: kimato yadyevaṃ svavyāghātena vinā sūtrārtho niṣpanna ityāha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9324: īśvaramaṅgīkṛtyākṣyādityasthatayātrāgnirucyata iti vadataḥ ko doṣa ityata āha- īśvaraścediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:9329: yadīśvaraḥ sarvaniyantābhyupagataḥ syāttadā sa eva prathamāgataḥ sākṣādakṣyādityasthatvenāmṛtatvādipramāṇaiḥ pratītaḥ kasmātparityajante /
GSP33nysu__1u:9334: doṣavatyeva tasmāt sā naiva kāryā kathañcana // MAnuv_1,2.13ef //
GSP33nysu__1u:9347: athavā prativādinaṃ nirīśvaraṃ niścitya sūtrakṛtānavasthityasambhavāvuktāviti pūrvagranthārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:9352: kiṃ tu nirnimittatvātsā naiva kāryā syāt /

GSP33nysu__1u:9720: apare tu, bhedābhedābhyāṃ vyavahāranirvāhaṃ paśyantaḥ kevarabhedapratiṣedhaṃ ca śrutīnāmarthaṃ bruvāṇā na viśeṣamicchanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:9721: anye tu, akhaṇḍameva brahmābhyupagamya dharmadharmyādivyavahārāḥ sarve 'pyavidyā'ropanimittā iti manyamānā viśeṣamavajānate /

GSP33nysu__1u:9727: sthāneṣu svaśāstrapradeśeṣu ekaḥ samavāya iti vastuni bhedābhedāviti ca vyavahartṛbhiryathā te samavāyabhedābhedā viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantoṅgīkāryāstathā bhāvābhāvasvarūpāśceti yojanā /

GSP33nysu__1u:9755: na hyavayavāvayavyādīnāṃ sambandho 'sti yata ekaḥ samavāyaḥ /

GSP33nysu__1u:10228: nanu sarvajñānāṃ sarvaṃ na prakāśata iti vipratiṣiddham /

GSP33nysu__1u:10284: anyatraiva prasiddhaśabdasamanvayapratipādanaṃ pādārtha iti bhāṣyātpariśeṣādvā siddham /

GSP33nysu__1u:12794: “so 'yaṃ vihāra iha me tanubhṛtsvabhāvasambhūtaye bhavati bhūtikṛdeva bhūtyāḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12800: dvibhāgaṃ brahmeti yannirākṛtaṃ tasyopasaṃhāra eka iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:12802: ato na brahmopādānatvaṃ prakṛtyadhikaraṇārtha iti (sambandhaḥ) śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12818: bahu syāmiti tasyaiva hyuktamārgeṇa yujyate // MAnuv_1,4.80ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12852: dṛśyate mandadṛṣṭayaiva sa sarga iti kathyate // MAnuv_1,4.81 //
GSP33nysu__1u:12855: sa sarga iti kathyata ityetāvatpariṇāmavāde 'pi samam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12877: avikṛtamevānyadanyātmanā dṛśyata ityasambhavi ityata uktam- mṛṣeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12881: mandā bhavati dṛṣṭiryayā sā mandadṛṣṭistayā māyayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12900: sā mandadṛṣṭistasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ tato 'nyagā // MAnuv_1,4.82ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12902: viśvasya brahmavivartatve nirākartavye mandadṛṣṭayāśrayapraśno 'nupapanna ityata uktam- seti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12906: mandadṛṣṭāvāśrayānirūpaṇādinā nirākṛtāyāṃ sarvamidaṃ nirākṛtaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12911: māyāvādino hi kecit brahmaiva svāvidyayā jagadākāreṇa vivartate svapnādivaditi manyante /
GSP33nysu__1u:12916: jīvā eva svāvidyayā pratyekaṃ prapañcākāreṇa brahma vibhrāmyanti,
GSP33nysu__1u:12920: iha jīvagetyanuktvā tato 'nyageti vadatā sa jīvaḥ kiṃ brahmaṇo 'nyo('nanyo vā)
GSP33nysu__1u:12922: tatra dvitīyaḥ prathame praviśatīti taṃ dūṣayati- brahmaṇaścediti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12938: anyathā śuktijñānavato 'pi tadajñānaṃ na viruddhayateti bhramānucchedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:12948: yadi brahmavyatiriktajīvāśrayā viśvabhrāntiraṅgīkriyate tadā bhrāntyāśrayasya bhrāntikalpitatvāyogāt jīvabrahmaṇoranyatā svābhāvikītyāpannam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12953: nādehayogino dṛṣṭiriti tat kāraṇaṃ svataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.83ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:12958: kintu dehayogarahitasyendriyābhāvātatpadārthadarśanaṃ na sambhavatītyato hetoḥ āropakāraṇamindriyaṃ tadāśrayo dehaśca kalpanāṃ vinaivāstītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12959: nahi sukhādivadrajatādivadvāsya prapañcasya sākṣimātrasiddhatvaṃ paro manyate dehendriyāṇāmapyutpattimatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12962: astu brahmavyatiriktānāṃ jīvānāṃ sakāraṇānāṃ tadīyadehendriyāṇāṃ cābhrāntikalpitatvam /
GSP33nysu__1u:12963: draṣṭṛtvena darśanakaraṇatvena tadāśrayatvena tatkāraṇatvena ca bhrānteḥ pūrvabhāvitvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:12964: tadatiriktāstu prapañco 'stu bhrāntikalpita ityata āha- dehina iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12965: dehinaḥ kāraṇayutā dehāśca yadi na bhramāt // MAnuv_1,4.83cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:12979: bhrāntyā brahmaṇo bhinnasya bāhyādhyātmikārthabhrama iti hi manyata ityata āha- bhedo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:12983: kintu jīvabrahmaṇorbhedo 'pi yadi bhramajo bhramasiddhaḥ aṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13043: neha nānetyādiśrutyā sarvasyāpi viyadādeḥ prapañcasya bhrāntikalpitatvābhidhānāt ityāśaṅkayedamuditam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13049: yadi viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13050: bhramāropitaṃ viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13052: bhramaśabdaḥ jñāne arthe ca pareṣāṃ prasiddha iti bhramatva ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13053: yadyapyayamarthaḥ prathamasūtre varṇitaḥ tathāpi tatrādhyātmikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ (prapañco)
GSP33nysu__1u:13057: nanu sarvo 'pyayaṃ prapañco bhrāntisiddho 'pi vyāvahāriko bhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__1u:13059: vyāvahārikatā cāsya syādabādhyatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.86ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:13065: yato 'sya prapañcasya vyāvahārikatā tu abādhyatva eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13093: nanu tathāpyasatyasya svāpnakāminīsambhogādeḥ caramadhātuvisargādyarthakriyākāritvadarśanāt vyāptivikalastarka ityata āha- na ceti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13098: tarhi mama matena vyāptibhaṅgo 'stu mayā mṛṣātvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:13100: nanu kathaṃ bādarāyaṇasya na mṛṣā svapna ityata āha- vāsaneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13103: tasya svapnasyāpi māyāmātramiti vadatā sūtrakāreṇa vāsanājanitatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt idaṃ jñāyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:13104: yat na tasya svapno mṛṣābhimata iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13106: kiñca śrutyanusārī hi sūtrakārasya siddhāntaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13107: śrutyā ca svāpnārthasya kartāraṃ vadantyā satyatvamevābhipretamiti na mṛṣātvaṃ sūtrakṛto 'bhimatamityāha- sa hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13113: iti sūtrakṛtaiva tanmithyātvasya vakṣyamāṇatvādityato vāha- vāsaneti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13118: tasyāgāminaḥ sūtrasya vāsanājanitatvapratipādakatvena asmābhiraṅgīkṛtatvāditi vā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13119: na kevalaṃ vakṣyamāṇopapattivaśāt mṛṣātvaṃ na sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13149: tathā sarpe samāropitāyāḥ kusumamālāyāḥ santoṣakāritā upalabhyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:13168: sā ca viṣadravyeṇeva bhayādināpi bhavatīti na bādhyasya(syāpi)
GSP33nysu__1u:13171: nanu kiṃ jñānamātraṃ bhayādijanakaṃ kiṃvā viṣayāvacchinnam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13182: gurūṇāṃ ṭīkāṃ paṭhati ityādau viśeṣaṇasyāpi kārakatvamasti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13201: kiñca vilakṣaṇasamāgrījanmanorjñānayoryathā parokṣatvāparokṣatvarūpo viśeṣaḥ viṣayopādhinā vinābhyupagamyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:13203: api ca sarpajñānasya vilakṣaṇārthakriyā na svagatenātiśayena vinopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13206: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyasarpajñāne samīcīnayā sāmagṣā jātaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:13208: ato viṣayāntarbhāvamantareṇa svagatenaiva viśeṣeṇa sarpādijñānasya bhayādijanakatvānna sarpasya kiñcitkaratvamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13209: tadevaṃ yatrātharkriyā niścitā na tatra mithyātvam,
GSP33nysu__1u:13210: yatra tu mithyātvaṃ na tatrārthakriyeti na tarkamūlavyāpteḥ kvāpi bhaṅgaḥ,
GSP33nysu__1u:13216: nanvarthakriyākāritvaṃ yathā vipakṣānmithyābhūtādvayāvṛttam evaṃ sapakṣādbrahmaṇo 'pi vyāvṛttatvādasādhāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13218: tasyāpi prapañcāntarbhāvena vipratipannatvādityata āha- brahma tviti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13219: brahma tvarthakriyākāri parataḥ svata eva vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13222: tena māyāvādinaiva brahma prapañcādapyatiśayenārthakriyākāryamaṅgīkṛtameva hi janmādisūtre jagatkāraṇatvenoktatvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13224: nanu mayāṅgīkriyamāṇaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyākāritvaṃ ca na svābhāvikam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13228: ataḥ kathamāpādakasya sapakṣapraveśa ityata āha- parata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13237: brahmaṇo'rthakriyākāritvaṃ parata ityasya nāyamarthaḥ dāruyantrasyeva parādhīnam iti,
GSP33nysu__1u:13239: kintu gagane malinateva niṣkriyā eva brahmaṇi māyāsambandhādarthakriyā(di)
GSP33nysu__1u:13241: na caivaṃvidhena sapakṣapraveśo bhavatyāpādakasyetyata āha paratastva iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13259: nacaivaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyāyāḥ paratastve pramāṇamasti yadbādhakaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:13262: paratastve ca prāmāṇyasyānavasthāpātena na pramā niścīyeta /
GSP33nysu__1u:13265: evaṃ śrutibalena parastve 'rthakriyāyāḥ svīkṛte tadabhidhātrī“sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjata';
GSP33nysu__1u:13269: iti śrutiretacchativirodhātparatastve na prameti kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13276: na hi sampratipattiḥ syādatastiṣṭhatu sā pramā // MAnuv_1,4.90 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13291: nahi kālavilambena bādhitārthaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13293: tathāpi prapañcamithyātvasādhanāya tadupanyāsaḥ kuto na kāryaḥ ityata āha- na hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13294: na hi vipratipannena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ kvacit // MAnuv_1,4.91ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:13302: anyathā bhavatāmapi prapañcamithyātvanirākaraṇe tatsatyatvasādhane ca pramāṇābhāvena kathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13304: na tāvatsatyaṃ māṃ prati vaktumucitam mayā satyasya sādhakatvānaṅgīkārāt,
GSP33nysu__1u:13305: yatsatyaṃ na tatra kriyā'veśaḥ yatra ca kriyā'veśo na tatsatyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13306: naca vācyaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ satyasya sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13314: samyak sampratipannaṃ tanna vivatarmamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.91c-f //
GSP33nysu__1u:13319: hiśabdaḥ, sarvaṃ vastu jñātatayājñātatayā vā sākṣicaitanyasya viṣaya evetyāditatprasiddhidyotakaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13325: viśvasya satyatāmapi tenaiva sādhayāma ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13330: tatkathaṃ kimapyanaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ māṃ prati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamityucyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13341: ādye('pi) kiñcidapi nāṅgīkṛtamiti pakṣahāneḥ ātmano 'naṅgīkartṛtāpi nāṅgīkṛteti dvitīya evāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13346: vastutastu vayaṃ sarvato nivṛttāḥ svataḥ siddhe cidātmani brahmatatve kevale bhāramavalambya caritārthāḥ sukhamāsmahe /
GSP33nysu__1u:13347: ye tu svaparikalpitasādhanadūṣaṇādivyavasthayā vicāramavatārya tattvaṃ nirṇetumicchanti tānprati brūmo na sādhvīyaṃ bhavatāṃ vicāravyavastheti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13354: bhavatkalpitavyavasthaiva vyāhatatvādasādhvī bhavadvayavastheti brūmo na punaratra kimapi pramāṇamaṅgīkurma iti cenna,
GSP33nysu__1u:13357: kiṃ parakīyavyavasthāyā asādhutvasvayamavabuddhaya paraṃ prati bodhyate 'navabuddhayaiva vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13392: na kevalamāntarasya sukhādeḥ kintu bāhyasya gaganādeśceti vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13396: sākṣītyevokte sākṣiṇo 'prāmāṇyāt prāmāṇye vā pramāṇatritvabhaṅgāt na viśvasatyatvaṃ pramitamiti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13400: naca sākṣirā vinā bāhyapratyakṣamātreṇaindriyakāṇāmapi satyatā siddhayatītyataḥ sākṣītyuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13412: pareṣāṃ ca iha bhūtale ghaṭābhāva iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13422: kiñcaivamapi nehāloka itīhālokatryaṇukamiti ca pratyayo duḥsampādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13441: śabdo hi śrotreṇa prāpto vā gṛhyate 'prāpto vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13444: sā hi na tāvacchrotrasya gamanena sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:13454: naca śaṅkhaśravasormadhye śaṅkho vā tadārabdhadravyaṃ vāsti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13476: kiñca śabdo varṇātmā vā pakṣo dhvanirūpo vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13480: ghaṭādīnāmekendriyagrāhyatvābhāve 'pi ātmanastathātvavad dravyasyaiva sato bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatve 'pi virodhābhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13481: yadi (śabdo) dravyaṃ syāt bāhyendriyagrāhyo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13499: śrotrasya cakṣuṣa iva gatvāgrāhitve śabde diksaṃśayo na syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:13522: śabdo na vāyavīyaḥ viśeṣaguṇatve sati tvagindriyāvedyatvādgandhavaditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:13536: ātmasamavetasyaiva vīcītaraṅganyāyena mūlapratyabhijñānopapattau vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāc ca /
GSP33nysu__1u:13544: pāde me sukhaṃ śirasi me duḥkhaṃ mano me duḥkhitamiti darśanātsukhādiṣu vyabhicārāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13555: kiñcātra sarvatra sāhacaryadarśane saṅkoca eva dravyāntarakalpanāyā laghīyān /
GSP33nysu__1u:13558: aṣṭadravyātiriktāśrita ityeva sādhane guṇādivṛttisāmānyādapi vyāvṛttatvenāsādhāraṇatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:13559: śabdāśrayaḥ itarebhyo bhidyate śabdāśrayatvāt vyatirekeṇa pṛthivīvat iti prayoga iti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__1u:13562: abhāvasya sādhyatvādabhāvābhāvasya ca bhāvatvena pratiyogyanapekṣatayā vyāptigrahaṇasambhavānna doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:13573: tadbhāgā eva diśo na dravyāntaramiti tāsāmapi sākṣivedya(siddha)taiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:13577: na tāvatā tasya traikālikabādhavaidhuryalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ siddhayati,
GSP33nysu__1u:13580: sākṣisiddhasya na kvāpi bādhyatvaṃ tadadoṣataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.94cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:13604: sākṣiṇa eva hi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrāhakatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13610: yena sarvakāleṣvabādhyatvaṃ sākṣiṇā pratīyata ityata āha- kālo hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13611: kālo hi sākṣipratyakṣaḥ suṣuptau ca pratītitaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.95cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:13615: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ sukhamahamasvāpsamiti suṣuptyutthitasya parāmarśadarśanāt na hyananubhūtasya parāmarśo yujyate,
GSP33nysu__1u:13628: kintu tadaivātītaṃ suṣuptikālamanubhūya tadātano duḥkhābhāvo 'numīyata ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13631: utthitasya kiṃ sākṣiṇātītakālānubhavamabhyupagamya sukhaparāmarśo nirākriyate uta pramāṇāntareṇa /
GSP33nysu__1u:13637: atītānāgatakālayostu sākṣivedyatvābhāvātkathaṃ traikālikābādhyabhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā prapañcasya siddhayatītyata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__1u:13660: tadetaditi sarvaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ vā smṛtigocaram /
GSP33nysu__1u:13661: sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ hyeva vartate // MAnuv_1,4.97 //
GSP33nysu__1u:13662: tasmānna taṃ vinā kiñcit smartuṃ draṣṭumathāpi vā /
GSP33nysu__1u:13665: yasmāttaditi smṛtigocarametaditi dṛśyaṃ vā sarvamapi sākṣisiddhena kālena khacitaṃ sambaddhameva vartate /
GSP33nysu__1u:13666: tasmāttaṃ kālaṃ vinā kālapratibhāsaṃ vinā kiñcidvayāptyādikaṃ smartuṃ vā dharmyādikaṃ draṣṭumiti vā na śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13668: anubhūtavyāptikasya puṃso 'nubhūyamāne smaryamāṇe vā dharmiṇi vyāpyadharmasyānubhavāt smaraṇādvā prāganubhūtāṃ vyāptiṃ smṛtavato vyāptasya pakṣe 'nusandhānamanumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13673: na punā rūpamityeva tattā ca pūrvakālasambandhitaiva /
GSP33nysu__1u:13675: anumānādijanyo 'pyabhūditi vā bhavatīti vā bhaviṣyatīti vodeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13680: tathāca vyāptyādiviṣayā api pratītayo na kālāviśiṣṭaṃ svārthaṃ gocacayituṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13686: tasya kālasya nityasiddhervyāptyādigrahaṇa eva sākṣiṇā siddhatvānna kālānumānasyāvasaro bhavet aniścite hyarthe nyāsyāvasaraḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13687: niścitaviṣayaṃ tu siddhasādhanatvāt pareṣāmāśrayāsiddham asmākaṃ tvasaṅgatamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13689: evaṃ kālaviṣayāṇi sarvānumānāni sāmānyato nirākṛtya viśeṣato nirākaroti- tadetaditi //
GSP33nysu__1u:13696: tathā yugapadāgatau ayugapadāgatau cireṇāgataḥ kṣipramāgataḥ iti pratyayāḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13716: tathāca liṅgapratītāveva liṅginaḥ kālasya sphuraṇātkathaṃ tena tadanumānam /
GSP33nysu__1u:13727: vipratipannaṃ prati parāparādipratyayānāṃ kāryatvena nimittānumānamidaṃ bhāṣyamiti /
GSP33nysu__1u:13732: ādye tannityasiddhestasya kālasya prāganumānānnityena sākṣiṇā siddheḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:13735_0: diśarīrāvasthā kāraṇatvena kālānumāne tannityasiddhestasya kālasambandhasya nityaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:13738: bahutvaṃ hi kālasya kiṃ paramāṇūnāmiva sahaiva,

GSP33nysu__1u:14460: yathā somyaikena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14461: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ lohamaṇirityeva satyam yathā /
GSP33nysu__1u:14462: somyaikena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14463: vācā'rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ kārṣṇāyasamityeva satyam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14464: yathaikamṛtpiṇḍādipariṇāmānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ tadananyayā tajjñānena jñātateti dṛṣṭāntatrayārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:14469: nāmadheyaṃ tadabhidhānamiti kumbhādervācyasya tadvācakānāṃ ca svarūpakāryavyapadeśādibhedātparasparaṃ bhedo vāstava ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__1u:14470: etairhetubhiḥ parasparaṃ bhedaścetkāraṇādapi taireva bheda iti pūrvapakṣaṃ niṣeddhumāha- mṛttiketyeva satyamiti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14472: yatprakāreṇa yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tatprakāreṇaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyam /
GSP33nysu__1u:14476: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya dṛṣṭāntākāṅkṣāyāmucyate- yathā somyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14478: ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__1u:14484: mṛttiketyeva satyamityeṣa brahmaṇo dṛṣṭānta āmnāta iti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14490: vācārabdhaṃ tu sāṅketyaṃ nāma syād ... // MAnuv_1,4.114ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:14493: lyuṭ ca bhāve karaṇādhikaraṇayośca vihito na karmaṇi naca“kṛtyalluṭo bahulam';
GSP33nysu__1u:14502: “ṭāpaṃ cāpi halantānāṃ yathā vācā niśā diśā';
GSP33nysu__1u:14507: vācārambhaṇaśabdādeva vikāratvalābhādvikāra iti punaruktaṃ syādatastātparyamāha- sāṅketyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14510: yathā caṣṭe 'neneti cakṣuriti nirvacanalabhyeti darśanakāraṇatve cakṣuṣā paśyatīti noktārthatā /
GSP33nysu__1u:14517: anena vikriyata iti vikāra iti karmaṇi ghañityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:14520: nityaṃ tu nāmadheyaṃ yanmṛttiketyādi vaidikam // MAnuv_1,4.114cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:14525: yanmṛttiketyādi saṃskṛtaṃ nāmadheyam tadeva nityamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:14541: yadā tu vācā yasyārambhaṇaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ vikāro janimaditi,
GSP33nysu__1u:14544: vikāritvādutpattivināśavaditi yāvaditi vā granthāntaroktā yojanā, tadā(tu)
GSP33nysu__1u:14563: tatra yathā prādhānyātsaṃskṛtajñānamātreṇa sāṅketikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__1u:14565: evamanityatvādināpradhānasya devatākarmādimiśrasya sakalasyāpi jagato jñānena yatphalaṃ tatsamastamapi nityatvādinā pradhānasya paramātmano jñānāllabhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:14582: sadātanaṃ satyamiti nirvacanena satyamiti padena nityamucyata eva /
GSP33nysu__1u:14596: ke satyaśabdasya nityatva eva prayogaścāstīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:14597: tameva prayogaṃ darśayituṃ“yadainaṃ jarāvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato '(syāti)
GSP33nysu__1u:14598: vaśiṣyata iti sa brūyānnāsya jarayaitajjīyarte na vadhenāsya hanyate etatsatyaṃ brahmapuram';
GSP33nysu__1u:14602: hanyate na vadhenāyaṃ jarayā ca na jīryati // MAnuv_1,4.117 //
GSP33nysu__1u:14603: etat satyaṃ brahmapuramiti nityatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.118ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:14605: yadainaṃ dehaṃ jarāvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vāyaṃ dehaḥ, (tadā)
GSP33nysu__1u:14606: tatastadasya dehasyāntargataḥ paramātmā dahyamānagehāntargatagaganavatkimatiśiṣyate kiṃvā paṭādivannaśyatīti pṛṣṭe,
GSP33nysu__1u:14611: atrāpi satyaśabdaḥ kuto nityārtha ityata āha- nityatva eva hīti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14617: etadeva spaṣṭīkartumetatsatyaṃ brahmapuramityetāvati paṭhitavye pūrvavākyamapi paṭhitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:14619: brahmaṇo jarāvadhayorabhāve satyatvaṃ hetutvenocyata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__1u:14624: jarādyupetānāṃ dehānāmasatyatvāsyāsiddheḥ asatyānāṃ ca śuktirajatādīnāṃ jarādyabhāvena vyatirekasyāpyabhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14632: tathāpi pratiśabdaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkaraṇe 'paryavasānaprasakterupalakṣaṇatve caikenāpi kṛtatvācchabdatrayopādānamanupapannamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:14645: kiṃ rūḍhimāśritya vācārambhaṇamityasya mithyeti vyākhyānaṃ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:14653: vācā kevalamārabhyate vikāro na tu vastuvṛttenāstīti vyākhyāne mithyātvaṃ labhyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__1u:14654: yataḥ śrutyā vācārambhaṇamityevokte kevalaśabdaprakṣepeṇa mithyeti vyākhyāne 'śrutakalpanameveti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14664: atha vikāro nāmadheyaṃ ca dvayamapi vācārambhaṇamiti vyākhyānaṃ,
GSP33nysu__1u:14684: iti mṛttikārthe prāpte tatparihāreṇa śabdasvarūpagrahaṇārthaṃ tadupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__1u:14685_0: pariṇāmavādino 'pi kṛdyoge tṛtīyāyā aṅgīkṛtatvāt lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vyākhyātatvādvācārambhaṇaṃ
GSP33nysu__1u:14693: tatra yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tayaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyamiti vyācakṣāṇena vaktavyam,
GSP33nysu__1u:14707: idānīṃ yathā somyetyādīni dṛṣṭāntavākyāni svamatena vyākariṣyanparakīyavyākhyāyāṃ tāvaddoṣamāha- eka iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14708: ekaḥ piṇḍo maṇiśceti padavaiyathyarmeva ca // MAnuv_1,4.119cd //
GSP33nysu__1u:14717: jagato brahmavikāratvena tadāropitatvena caikavijñānena sarvavijñāne vivakṣite mṛdā vijñātayā mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14719: kṛṣṇāyasā vijñātena kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syādityetāvatā pūrṇatvāttrayāṇāmekaśabdānāṃ piṇḍamaṇinakhanikṛntanaśabdānāṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ ca vigatāthartvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__1u:14729: nanvakeneti paramākāraṇasyaikatvaṃ piṇḍeneti kāryābhimukhyaṃ sarvamiti kāryanānātvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33nysu__1u:14744: yadyatra dṛṣṭāntatraye na vikāravivartavivakṣā kiṃ tarhi vivakṣitamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14746: vivakṣātra tu nityatve prādhānye coktavartmanā // MAnuv_1,4.121ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:14752: nityatvaṃ prādhānyopapādakameva na tu svatantramekavijñānena sarvavijñānasyeti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14762: asmākaṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāvādiprapañcārthatvena astyupayoga ityata āha- prādhānyeti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14765: ādipadena pralaye 'vasthānaṃ trivṛtkaraṇaṃ jīvarūpeṇa praveśanamityādikaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__1u:14768: tatpratipattyarthaṃ sṛṣṭayādeḥ pratipādaka eva granthavistaraḥ pravṛtto 'taḥ kathamasaṅgatiriti /
GSP33nysu__1u:14779: tasmāt kenāpi mārgeṇa na vivartamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.122ab //
GSP33nysu__1u:14817: kīdṛśaṃ tarhi janmādisūtre 'bhitihamityata āha- tata iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14823: vicitrānekakāryakartṛtve śramādidoṣāḥ prasajyanta ityata uktam- aśrama iti //
GSP33nysu__1u:14830: evamasminnadhyāye parabrahmaṇi nārāyaṇe pratipāditasya sakalaśrutisamanvayasya phalaṃ janmādisūtroditalakṣaṇasiddhimupasaṃharati- pūrṇeti //
